metadata.expansion_notes: Phase 13 FINAL - FANUC + OKUMA + HURCO + DMG MORI - TARGET REACHED
sources: SIEMENS SINUMERIK 840D sl Diagnostics Manual V4.7
HEIDENHAIN TNC 640 NC Error Messages Manual
MITSUBISHI M800/M80/E80 Series Alarm/Parameter Manual IB-1501279
SIEMENS SINUMERIK 840D sl Diagnostics Manual V4.7 SP2
MITSUBISHI MDS-A/MDS-B/MDS-C1 Servo Alarm Code Reference

fix_procedures_status.reason: Generic templates not suitable for life-safety application
fix_procedures_status.action_required: Add verified alarm-specific procedures from manufacturer documentation

alarms.name: PLEASE TURN OFF POWER
alarms.description: Parameter or program was changed. Turn power off and back on to apply changes.
alarms.quick_fix: Power cycle the control

alarms.name: TH PARITY ALARM
alarms.description: Parity error detected in tape/program data during read. Data corruption in program.
alarms.quick_fix: Re-transfer program, check communication cable

alarms.name: TV PARITY ALARM
alarms.description: TV check alarm - character count in block is odd when should be even.
alarms.quick_fix: Edit program to correct block format

alarms.name: TOO MANY DIGITS
alarms.description: Numeric value in program exceeds maximum allowed digits.
alarms.quick_fix: Check and correct numeric values in program

alarms.name: ADDRESS NOT FOUND
alarms.description: First character of block is not an address letter (A-Z).
alarms.quick_fix: Add proper address letter to block start

alarms.name: NO DATA AFTER ADDRESS
alarms.description: Address letter found but no numeric data follows it.
alarms.quick_fix: Add numeric value after address letter

alarms.name: ILLEGAL USE OF NEGATIVE SIGN
alarms.description: Negative sign used where not allowed or incorrect position.
alarms.quick_fix: Check negative sign usage in program

alarms.name: ILLEGAL USE OF DECIMAL POINT
alarms.description: Decimal point used incorrectly or where not allowed.
alarms.quick_fix: Correct decimal point usage

alarms.name: IMPROPER G-CODE
alarms.description: G-code used is not valid or not available on this control.
alarms.quick_fix: Check G-code list for valid codes

alarms.name: NO FEEDRATE COMMANDED
alarms.description: Cutting move commanded without feedrate specified.
alarms.quick_fix: Add F (feedrate) command before cutting move

alarms.name: OVER TOLERANCE OF RADIUS
alarms.description: Arc start/end points don't match radius within tolerance.
alarms.quick_fix: Verify arc I, J, K values and endpoints

alarms.name: ILLEGAL PLANE AXIS COMMANDED
alarms.description: Invalid axis specified for the selected plane (G17/G18/G19).
alarms.quick_fix: Match plane selection to axis commands

alarms.name: NO CIRCLE RADIUS
alarms.description: Circular interpolation commanded without radius (R) or I,J,K.
alarms.quick_fix: Add R value or I,J,K to arc command

alarms.name: ILLEGAL OFFSET VALUE
alarms.description: Tool offset value outside allowable range.
alarms.quick_fix: Check offset values in offset table

alarms.name: ILLEGAL OFFSET NUMBER
alarms.description: Tool offset number specified doesn't exist or is invalid.
alarms.quick_fix: Verify offset number exists in table

alarms.name: NO SOLUTION AT CRC
alarms.description: Cutter radius compensation cannot calculate valid path.
alarms.quick_fix: Reduce tool radius or modify path geometry

alarms.name: INTERFERENCE IN CRC
alarms.description: Cutter compensation detects tool will gouge workpiece.
alarms.quick_fix: Use smaller tool or modify programmed path

alarms.name: PROGRAM NUMBER NOT FOUND
alarms.description: Called program number (O number) not found in memory.
alarms.quick_fix: Load program or correct program number

alarms.name: SEQUENCE NUMBER NOT FOUND
alarms.description: Sequence number (N number) specified in search not found.
alarms.quick_fix: Verify sequence number exists in program

alarms.name: NO PROGRAM SPACE IN MEMORY
alarms.description: Not enough memory to store program. Memory full.
alarms.quick_fix: Delete unused programs to free memory

alarms.name: DATA NOT FOUND
alarms.description: Specified data or address not found during search.
alarms.quick_fix: Verify search target exists

alarms.name: TOO MANY PROGRAMS
alarms.description: Maximum number of programs in memory exceeded.
alarms.quick_fix: Delete unused programs

alarms.name: PROGRAM NUMBER ALREADY IN
alarms.description: Attempting to register program number that already exists.
alarms.quick_fix: Use different program number or delete existing

alarms.name: ILLEGAL PROGRAM NUMBER
alarms.description: Program number format invalid or out of range.
alarms.quick_fix: Use valid program number format

alarms.name: COMMUNICATION ERROR
alarms.description: Error during RS-232 or network communication.
alarms.quick_fix: Check cables and communication settings

alarms.name: DR SIGNAL OFF
alarms.description: Data Ready signal not received during communication.
alarms.quick_fix: Check RS-232 cable and device power

alarms.name: REFERENCE RETURN INCOMPLETE
alarms.description: Reference point return (home) not completed on all axes.
alarms.quick_fix: Execute reference return on all axes

alarms.name: PARAMETER WRITE ENABLE
alarms.description: Parameter write protection is disabled. Parameters can be changed.
alarms.quick_fix: Turn off PWE after parameter changes

alarms.name: APC ALARM: n AXIS NEED ZRN
alarms.description: Absolute position data lost. Reference return required on axis n.
alarms.quick_fix: Perform reference point return on indicated axis

alarms.name: APC ALARM: n AXIS COMMUNICATION
alarms.description: Communication error with absolute encoder on axis n.
alarms.quick_fix: Check encoder cable connections and encoder

alarms.name: APC ALARM: n AXIS OVER TIME
alarms.description: Absolute position detector response timeout on axis n.
alarms.quick_fix: Check encoder and communication lines

alarms.name: APC ALARM: n AXIS FRAMING
alarms.description: Framing error in absolute encoder data on axis n.
alarms.quick_fix: Check encoder cable shielding and routing

alarms.name: APC ALARM: n AXIS PARITY
alarms.description: Parity error in absolute encoder data on axis n.
alarms.quick_fix: Check encoder and replace if necessary

alarms.name: APC ALARM: n AXIS PULSE MISS
alarms.description: Pulse count error detected in absolute encoder on axis n.
alarms.quick_fix: Clean or replace encoder

alarms.name: APC ALARM: n AXIS BATTERY ZERO
alarms.description: Absolute encoder battery completely discharged on axis n.
alarms.quick_fix: Replace battery immediately and re-reference

alarms.name: APC ALARM: n AXIS BATTERY DOWN 1
alarms.description: Absolute encoder battery voltage low (warning level 1).
alarms.quick_fix: Replace battery soon - schedule replacement

alarms.name: APC ALARM: n AXIS BATTERY DOWN 2
alarms.description: Absolute encoder battery voltage critically low (warning level 2).
alarms.quick_fix: Replace battery immediately before position loss

alarms.name: APC ALARM: n AXIS ZRN IMPOSSIBLE
alarms.description: Reference return cannot be completed on axis n.
alarms.quick_fix: Check mechanical system, dogs, and switches

alarms.name: SERVO ALARM: n-TH AXIS OVERLOAD
alarms.description: Servo motor overload on axis n. Motor exceeded torque/current limit.
alarms.quick_fix: Check for mechanical binding, reduce load, check diagnosis 201

alarms.name: SERVO ALARM: n-TH AXIS VRDY OFF
alarms.description: Servo amplifier ready signal (VRDY) turned off on axis n without CNC command.
alarms.quick_fix: Check servo amplifier status, power supply, E-stop circuit

alarms.name: SERVO ALARM: SV CARD NOT EXIST
alarms.description: Servo control card/board not detected by CNC.
alarms.quick_fix: Check servo card installation and connections

alarms.name: SERVO ALARM: CARD/SOFT MISMATCH
alarms.description: Servo card hardware and software versions incompatible.
alarms.quick_fix: Match servo card and software versions

alarms.name: SERVO ALARM: n-TH AXIS VRDY ON
alarms.description: Servo ready signal ON when it should be OFF on axis n.
alarms.quick_fix: Check servo amplifier and control signals

alarms.name: SERVO ALARM: ZERO POINT RETURN FAULT
alarms.description: Reference point return operation failed.
alarms.quick_fix: Check reference return dogs, switches, and parameters

alarms.name: SERVO ALARM: EXCESS ERROR
alarms.description: Position error between command and feedback exceeds allowable tolerance.
alarms.quick_fix: Check mechanical system, servo parameters, motor and encoder

alarms.name: SERVO ALARM: n AXIS TORQUE ALM
alarms.description: Torque limit alarm triggered on axis n.
alarms.quick_fix: Check for mechanical interference, reduce load

alarms.name: SERVO ALARM: n-TH AXIS EXCESS ERROR
alarms.description: Excessive position error at stop position on axis n.
alarms.quick_fix: Check mechanical system and servo tuning

alarms.name: SERVO ALARM: n-TH AXIS EXCESS ERROR
alarms.description: Excessive position error during motion on axis n.
alarms.quick_fix: Check mechanical system, adjust servo gains

alarms.name: SERVO ALARM: n-th AXIS LSI OVERFLOW
alarms.description: Position data overflow in servo control LSI on axis n.
alarms.quick_fix: Check and reset servo parameters

alarms.name: SERVO ALARM: n-TH AXIS DETECTION RELATED ERROR
alarms.description: Feedback or detection system error on axis n. Check diagnosis 200.
alarms.quick_fix: Check diagnosis 200, inspect encoder and cables

alarms.name: SERVO ALARM: n-TH AXIS EXCESS SHIFT
alarms.description: Excessive position shift detected on axis n.
alarms.quick_fix: Check encoder connections and cable shielding

alarms.name: SERVO ALARM: n-TH AXIS DISCONNECTION
alarms.description: Servo motor or encoder disconnected on axis n.
alarms.quick_fix: Check all motor and encoder cables and connectors

alarms.name: SERVO ALARM: n-TH AXIS PARAMETER INCORRECT
alarms.description: Servo parameter setting incorrect for axis n.
alarms.quick_fix: Verify and correct servo parameters for motor type

alarms.name: SERVO ALARM: n AXIS SYNC TORQUE
alarms.description: Synchronous axis torque deviation exceeded on axis n.
alarms.quick_fix: Check tandem/synchronous axis setup and mechanics

alarms.name: SERVO ALARM: n AXIS EXCESS ER (D)
alarms.description: Excessive error during deceleration on axis n.
alarms.quick_fix: Adjust deceleration parameters, check mechanical system

alarms.name: n AXIS: SV MOTOR OVERHEAT
alarms.description: Servo motor overtemperature on axis n. Motor thermal protection triggered.
alarms.quick_fix: Allow motor to cool, check ventilation, reduce duty cycle

alarms.name: n AXIS: CNV. OVERLOAD
alarms.description: Converter unit overloaded on axis n.
alarms.quick_fix: Check power supply capacity and regenerative load

alarms.name: n AXIS: CNV. LOW VOLT CONTROL
alarms.description: Converter control power voltage low on axis n.
alarms.quick_fix: Check control power supply connections

alarms.name: n AXIS: CNV. LOW VOLT DC LINK
alarms.description: DC link voltage too low in converter on axis n.
alarms.quick_fix: Check main power supply and converter

alarms.name: n AXIS: INV. LOW VOLT CONTROL
alarms.description: Inverter control voltage low on axis n.
alarms.quick_fix: Check inverter power connections

alarms.name: n AXIS: INV. LOW VOLT DC LINK
alarms.description: Inverter DC link voltage low on axis n.
alarms.quick_fix: Check power supply and regenerative resistor

alarms.name: n AXIS: SOFTTHERMAL (OVC)
alarms.description: Software thermal protection triggered (overcurrent) on axis n.
alarms.quick_fix: Reduce load, allow cooling, check for mechanical issues

alarms.name: n AXIS: CNV. OVERCURRENT POWER
alarms.description: Overcurrent in converter power circuit on axis n.
alarms.quick_fix: Check for short circuits in motor cables

alarms.name: n AXIS: INV. ABNORMAL CURRENT
alarms.description: Abnormal current detected in inverter on axis n.
alarms.quick_fix: Check motor insulation and amplifier

alarms.name: n AXIS: CNV. OVER VOLT DC LINK
alarms.description: DC link overvoltage in converter on axis n.
alarms.quick_fix: Check regenerative resistor and power supply

alarms.name: n AXIS: CNV. EX DECELERATION POW
alarms.description: Excessive deceleration power (regeneration) on axis n.
alarms.quick_fix: Adjust deceleration rate, check regen circuit

alarms.name: n AXIS: ABNORMAL CURRENT OFFSET
alarms.description: Current sensor offset error on axis n.
alarms.quick_fix: Recalibrate or replace amplifier

alarms.name: n AXIS: CNV. CHARGE FAILURE
alarms.description: DC link capacitor charge failure on axis n.
alarms.quick_fix: Check charge circuit and DC link capacitors

alarms.name: n AXIS: CNV. COOLING FAN FAILURE
alarms.description: Converter cooling fan fault on axis n.
alarms.quick_fix: Check and replace cooling fan

alarms.name: n AXIS: INV. COOLING FAN FAILURE
alarms.description: Inverter cooling fan fault on axis n.
alarms.quick_fix: Check and replace cooling fan

alarms.name: n AXIS: SOFT DISCONNECT ALARM
alarms.description: Software detected motor disconnect on axis n.
alarms.quick_fix: Check motor power cables and connectors

alarms.name: n AXIS: HARD DISCONNECT ALARM
alarms.description: Hardware detected motor disconnect on axis n.
alarms.quick_fix: Inspect and repair motor cable connections

alarms.name: n AXIS: HARD DISCONNECT (EXT)
alarms.description: External hardware disconnect detected on axis n.
alarms.quick_fix: Check external motor connections

alarms.name: n AXIS: UNMATCHED FEEDBACK ALARM
alarms.description: Feedback signal mismatch on axis n (dual feedback).
alarms.quick_fix: Check both feedback devices for matching signals

alarms.name: n AXIS: INV. IPM ALARM
alarms.description: Intelligent Power Module alarm in inverter on axis n.
alarms.quick_fix: Check IPM module and motor connections

alarms.name: n AXIS: FSSB DISCONNECT
alarms.description: FSSB (high-speed serial bus) communication lost on axis n.
alarms.quick_fix: Check FSSB fiber cables and amplifier

alarms.name: n AXIS: ILLEGAL AMP INTERFACE
alarms.description: Invalid amplifier interface detected on axis n.
alarms.quick_fix: Verify amplifier type matches configuration

alarms.name: n AXIS: SEND CNC DATA FAILED
alarms.description: Failed to send data from CNC to servo on axis n.
alarms.quick_fix: Check servo communication cables

alarms.name: n AXIS: MOTOR/AMP COMBINATION
alarms.description: Motor and amplifier combination invalid on axis n.
alarms.quick_fix: Verify motor and amplifier compatibility

alarms.name: OVER TRAVEL: +n
alarms.description: Positive direction software overtravel on axis n.
alarms.quick_fix: Jog axis back into range, check work offsets

alarms.name: OVER TRAVEL: -n
alarms.description: Negative direction software overtravel on axis n.
alarms.quick_fix: Jog axis back into range, check work offsets

alarms.name: OVER TRAVEL: +n
alarms.description: Positive direction hardware overtravel on axis n.
alarms.quick_fix: Jog axis off limit switch, check for damage

alarms.name: OVER TRAVEL: -n
alarms.description: Negative direction hardware overtravel on axis n.
alarms.quick_fix: Jog axis off limit switch, check for damage

alarms.name: OVER TRAVEL: +n
alarms.description: Positive stored stroke limit exceeded on axis n.
alarms.quick_fix: Modify program to stay within limits

alarms.name: OVER TRAVEL: -n
alarms.description: Negative stored stroke limit exceeded on axis n.
alarms.quick_fix: Modify program to stay within limits

alarms.name: OVERHEAT: CONTROL UNIT
alarms.description: CNC control unit temperature exceeded safe limit.
alarms.quick_fix: Check fans, clean filters, improve ventilation

alarms.name: OVERHEAT: FAN MOTOR
alarms.description: Cooling fan motor overheated or failed.
alarms.quick_fix: Replace cooling fan

alarms.name: OVERHEAT: SPINDLE
alarms.description: Spindle motor temperature exceeded safe limit.
alarms.quick_fix: Allow spindle to cool, check cooling system

alarms.name: SPINDLE SERIAL LINK START FAULT
alarms.description: Failed to establish serial communication with spindle amplifier.
alarms.quick_fix: Check spindle communication cable and amplifier

alarms.name: FIRST SPINDLE ALARM DETECTION (AL-XX)
alarms.description: Alarm detected in first spindle amplifier. XX indicates specific alarm.
alarms.quick_fix: Check spindle amplifier LED display for specific fault

alarms.name: FIRST SPINDLE MODE CHANGE FAULT
alarms.description: First spindle failed to change mode (orientation, tapping, etc.).
alarms.quick_fix: Check spindle mechanics and amplifier

alarms.name: SPINDLE-1 ABNORMAL TORQUE ALM
alarms.description: Abnormal torque detected on first spindle.
alarms.quick_fix: Check tool and workpiece, verify spindle operation

alarms.name: SECOND SPINDLE ALARM DETECTION (AL-XX)
alarms.description: Alarm detected in second spindle amplifier.
alarms.quick_fix: Check second spindle amplifier LED display

alarms.name: SECOND SPINDLE MODE CHANGE FAULT
alarms.description: Second spindle failed to change mode.
alarms.quick_fix: Check second spindle mechanics and amplifier

alarms.name: ROM PARITY
alarms.description: ROM parity error detected. System software corruption.
alarms.quick_fix: May require ROM replacement or system reload

alarms.name: SRAM PARITY: (BYTE 0)
alarms.description: SRAM parity error in byte 0. Memory corruption.
alarms.quick_fix: Check battery, may need memory board replacement

alarms.name: SERVO ALARM (1-4 AXIS)
alarms.description: General servo alarm on axes 1-4. Check specific axis.
alarms.quick_fix: Check individual axis alarms for details

alarms.name: FSSB ALARM
alarms.description: FSSB (high-speed serial bus) system alarm.
alarms.quick_fix: Check all FSSB fiber connections

alarms.name: CPU INTERRUPT
alarms.description: CPU interrupt error. System fault.
alarms.quick_fix: Power cycle, contact service if repeats

alarms.name: PMC SYSTEM ALARM
alarms.description: PMC (Programmable Machine Controller) system error.
alarms.quick_fix: Check PMC ladder diagram, may need PMC reload

alarms.name: PMC WATCH DOG ALARM
alarms.description: PMC watchdog timer expired. PMC stopped responding.
alarms.quick_fix: Check PMC program for infinite loops

alarms.name: NON MASK INTERRUPT
alarms.description: Non-maskable interrupt occurred. Critical system fault.
alarms.quick_fix: Check hardware, contact service

alarms.name: F-BUS ERROR
alarms.description: F-bus communication error.
alarms.quick_fix: Check bus connections, contact service

alarms.name: BUS ERROR
alarms.description: System bus error detected.
alarms.quick_fix: Check hardware connections, contact service

alarms.name: COMM. FAILURE WITH MOCON/MOCON MEMORY FAULT
alarms.description: Communication failure between MOCON and main processor during self-test, or MOCON memory fault detected.
alarms.quick_fix: Check cable connections, re-seat bus cables, check MOCON/processor status lights

alarms.name: SERVOS OFF
alarms.description: Servo motors are off, tool changer disabled, coolant off, spindle stopped. Normal at startup.
alarms.quick_fix: Press RESET to power servos on if no other fault exists

alarms.name: X SERVO ERROR TOO LARGE
alarms.description: X-axis servo motor load exceeded parameter 9 maximum error. Position deviation too large.
alarms.quick_fix: Check X axis for mechanical binding, verify encoder, press RESET

alarms.name: Y SERVO ERROR TOO LARGE
alarms.description: Y-axis servo motor load exceeded maximum error parameter. Position deviation too large.
alarms.quick_fix: Check Y axis for mechanical binding, verify encoder, press RESET

alarms.name: Z SERVO ERROR TOO LARGE
alarms.description: Z-axis servo motor load exceeded maximum error parameter. Position deviation too large.
alarms.quick_fix: Check Z axis mechanics including counterbalance, press RESET

alarms.name: A SERVO ERROR TOO LARGE
alarms.description: A-axis (rotary) servo motor load exceeded maximum error. Position deviation too large.
alarms.quick_fix: Check A axis rotary table mechanics, press RESET

alarms.name: EMERGENCY OFF
alarms.description: Emergency stop button pressed or E-stop circuit triggered.
alarms.quick_fix: Release E-stop button, check safety interlocks, press RESET

alarms.name: X SERVO OVERLOAD
alarms.description: X-axis servo motor current exceeded safe limits. Thermal protection may be active.
alarms.quick_fix: Reduce cutting load, check for binding, allow motor to cool

alarms.name: Y SERVO OVERLOAD
alarms.description: Y-axis servo motor current exceeded safe limits.
alarms.quick_fix: Reduce cutting load, check for binding, allow motor to cool

alarms.name: Z SERVO OVERLOAD
alarms.description: Z-axis servo motor current exceeded safe limits.
alarms.quick_fix: Check counterbalance, reduce load, allow motor to cool

alarms.name: A SERVO OVERLOAD
alarms.description: A-axis servo motor current exceeded safe limits.
alarms.quick_fix: Reduce load, check rotary table, allow motor to cool

alarms.name: NO INTERRUPT
alarms.description: System interrupt signal not received. Control board communication fault.
alarms.quick_fix: Power cycle, check board connections, contact service if persists

alarms.name: SHUTTLE IN FAULT (Mill) / TURRET UNLOCK FAULT (Lathe)
alarms.description: Mill: Tool shuttle failed to move to spindle. Lathe: Turret failed to unlock.
alarms.quick_fix: Check tool changer mechanism, verify sensors, check air/hydraulic pressure

alarms.name: SHUTTLE OUT FAULT (Mill) / TURRET LOCK FAULT (Lathe)
alarms.description: Mill: Tool shuttle failed to retract. Lathe: Turret failed to lock after index.
alarms.quick_fix: Check mechanism for obstruction, verify sensor operation

alarms.name: TURRET ROTATE FAULT
alarms.description: Tool turret/carousel failed to start rotating or failed to stop at correct position.
alarms.quick_fix: Check turret motor, verify position sensor, adjust parameters 62/63

alarms.name: SPINDLE ORIENTATION FAULT
alarms.description: Spindle failed to reach orientation position for tool change or tapping.
alarms.quick_fix: Check spindle orientation sensor and encoder, verify belt tension

alarms.name: SPINDLE HIGH GEAR FAULT
alarms.description: Spindle failed to shift to high gear range.
alarms.quick_fix: Check gear shift mechanism and solenoids

alarms.name: SPINDLE LOW GEAR FAULT
alarms.description: Spindle failed to shift to low gear range.
alarms.quick_fix: Check gear shift mechanism and solenoids

alarms.name: ATC FAULT
alarms.description: General automatic tool changer fault detected.
alarms.quick_fix: Check ATC mechanism, verify tool positions, run ATC recovery

alarms.name: SPINDLE FAULT
alarms.description: General spindle drive fault detected.
alarms.quick_fix: Check spindle drive display for specific error code

alarms.name: TOOL UNCLAMPED
alarms.description: Tool not properly clamped in spindle during operation.
alarms.quick_fix: Verify air pressure, check drawbar operation, reseat tool

alarms.name: TOOL NOT FOUND
alarms.description: Programmed tool number not found in tool magazine.
alarms.quick_fix: Verify tool is in magazine and tool table is correct

alarms.name: OVERTRAVEL +X
alarms.description: X-axis exceeded positive software travel limit.
alarms.quick_fix: Jog axis back into range, check work offsets and program

alarms.name: OVERTRAVEL -X
alarms.description: X-axis exceeded negative software travel limit.
alarms.quick_fix: Jog axis back into range, check work offsets and program

alarms.name: OVERTRAVEL +Y
alarms.description: Y-axis exceeded positive software travel limit.
alarms.quick_fix: Jog axis back into range, check work offsets and program

alarms.name: OVERTRAVEL -Y
alarms.description: Y-axis exceeded negative software travel limit.
alarms.quick_fix: Jog axis back into range, check work offsets and program

alarms.name: OVERTRAVEL +Z
alarms.description: Z-axis exceeded positive software travel limit.
alarms.quick_fix: Jog axis back into range, check tool length offsets

alarms.name: OVERTRAVEL -Z
alarms.description: Z-axis exceeded negative software travel limit.
alarms.quick_fix: Jog axis back into range, check tool length offsets

alarms.name: SERVO ERROR TOO LARGE
alarms.description: General servo following error exceeded tolerance on any axis.
alarms.quick_fix: Check which axis has error, inspect mechanical system

alarms.name: X AXIS DRIVE FAULT
alarms.description: X-axis servo drive amplifier fault detected.
alarms.quick_fix: Check drive status LEDs, allow cooling, check power

alarms.name: Y AXIS DRIVE FAULT
alarms.description: Y-axis servo drive amplifier fault detected.
alarms.quick_fix: Check drive status LEDs, allow cooling, check power

alarms.name: Z AXIS DRIVE FAULT
alarms.description: Z-axis servo drive amplifier fault detected.
alarms.quick_fix: Check drive status LEDs, allow cooling, check power

alarms.name: A AXIS DRIVE FAULT
alarms.description: A-axis servo drive amplifier fault detected.
alarms.quick_fix: Check drive status LEDs, allow cooling, check power

alarms.name: SPINDLE DIRECTION FAULT
alarms.description: Problem with rigid tapping hardware. Spindle direction feedback error.
alarms.quick_fix: Check rigid tapping hardware and spindle encoder

alarms.name: APC-PALLET CLAMP TIMEOUT
alarms.description: Pallet in mill did not clamp within allowed time.
alarms.quick_fix: Check for obstructions, verify air pressure, check solenoids

alarms.name: MACRO NOT COMPLETED - SPINDLE DISABLED
alarms.description: Macro code for optional equipment not completed due to E-stop, reset, or power down.
alarms.quick_fix: Check optional equipment status, restart macro

alarms.name: SPINDLE NOT TURNING
alarms.description: Spindle not turning when commanded. Check for G99 feed per revolution mode.
alarms.quick_fix: Check spindle drive, verify belt, check G98/G99 mode

alarms.name: B SERVO ERROR TOO LARGE
alarms.description: B-axis servo motor position error exceeded Parameter 159.
alarms.quick_fix: Check B axis mechanics, motor, and encoder

alarms.name: MISC. SOFTWARE ERROR
alarms.description: Miscellaneous software error detected in control.
alarms.quick_fix: Power cycle machine, contact Haas if persists

alarms.name: VD OVER TEMP
alarms.description: Vector drive (spindle drive) temperature exceeded safe limit.
alarms.quick_fix: Allow drive to cool, check cooling fans, reduce spindle load

alarms.name: SPINDLE OVERHEAT
alarms.description: Spindle motor or bearing temperature exceeded safe limits.
alarms.quick_fix: Stop spindle, allow cooling, check bearings if persists

alarms.name: NO. OF PROGRAMS CHANGED
alarms.description: Number of programs in memory has changed since last edit.
alarms.quick_fix: Informational only, verify program list is correct

alarms.name: SPINDLE DRIVE FAULT
alarms.description: Fault detected in spindle drive system.
alarms.quick_fix: Check spindle drive status display for specific fault code

alarms.name: TOOL CHANGE FAULT
alarms.description: Mechanical issue detected during tool change operation.
alarms.quick_fix: Check ATC mechanism for obstructions, verify all sensors

alarms.name: EXPRSN. NOT ALLOWED WITH N OR O
alarms.description: Expression not allowed with N (sequence) or O (program) addresses.
alarms.quick_fix: Edit program to correct macro syntax

alarms.name: ILLEGAL MACRO EXPRESSION REFERENCE
alarms.description: Invalid reference in macro expression.
alarms.quick_fix: Check macro variable references

alarms.name: ILLEGAL ASSIGNMENT VAR OR VALUE
alarms.description: Illegal variable assignment or value in macro.
alarms.quick_fix: Check variable assignment in macro

alarms.name: CONDITIONAL REQUIRED PRIOR TO THEN
alarms.description: IF statement missing before THEN in macro.
alarms.quick_fix: Add IF conditional before THEN statement

alarms.name: VAR. REF. ILLEGAL DURING MOVEMENT
alarms.description: Variable reference not allowed during axis motion.
causes: Trying to read variable during move
alarms.quick_fix: Read variable before or after motion block

alarms.name: COMM. FAILURE WITH MOCON2
alarms.description: Communication failure with secondary MOCON board.
alarms.quick_fix: Check cable connections to MOCON2 board

alarms.name: NEGATIVE R AND C VALUES NOT ALLOWED
alarms.description: Negative values for R (radius) or C (chamfer) not permitted.
alarms.quick_fix: Use positive values for R and C

alarms.name: LOW BATTERY

alarms.name: AXIS n SOFTWARE LIMIT SWITCH MINUS

alarms.name: INVERTER FAULT
alarms.description: Issue with inverter - defective control board, motor overcurrent, voltage issue, or shorted motor.
alarms.quick_fix: Check inverter diagnostics, may need drive replacement

alarms.name: SPINDLE DRIVE UNIT FAULT
alarms.description: Spindle drive unit has detected a fault condition requiring immediate attention.
alarms.quick_fix: Check spindle drive alarm LED codes

alarms.name: POWER SUPPLY VOLTAGE ABNORMAL
alarms.description: Supplied voltage is abnormally high or low during heavy spindle acceleration/deceleration.
alarms.quick_fix: Supply correct power per KVA rating, check connections

alarms.name: IO MAPPING ERROR
alarms.description: I/O mapping error after option installation or software update.
alarms.quick_fix: Install IO mapping software, check switch settings

alarms.name: SPINDLE D/A CONTROL DATA FILE READ ERROR
alarms.description: Failed to read spindle D/A control data file during startup.
alarms.quick_fix: Reload spindle data files from backup

alarms.name: TCP/IP BOARD DETECTED ERROR
alarms.description: Network communication board has detected an error condition.
alarms.quick_fix: Check network connections, replace board if needed

alarms.name: LOAD INFORMATION FILE NOT FOUND
alarms.description: Required load information file is missing from the system.
alarms.quick_fix: Restore file from backup

alarms.name: FILE LOAD ERROR
alarms.description: Error occurred while loading a system or program file.
alarms.quick_fix: Check file integrity, reload from backup

alarms.name: MSB FILE MISMATCH
alarms.description: Machine specification backup file does not match current configuration.
alarms.quick_fix: Reload correct MSB file

alarms.name: X AXIS OVERTRAVEL POSITIVE
alarms.description: X-axis exceeded positive travel limit.
alarms.quick_fix: Move axis in negative direction, check program

alarms.name: Y AXIS OVERTRAVEL POSITIVE
alarms.description: Y-axis exceeded positive travel limit.
alarms.quick_fix: Move axis in negative direction, check program

alarms.name: Y AXIS OVERTRAVEL NEGATIVE
alarms.description: Y-axis exceeded negative travel limit.
alarms.quick_fix: Move axis in positive direction, check program

alarms.name: Z AXIS OVERTRAVEL POSITIVE
alarms.description: Z-axis exceeded positive travel limit.
alarms.quick_fix: Move axis in negative direction, check program

alarms.name: Z AXIS OVERTRAVEL NEGATIVE
alarms.description: Z-axis exceeded negative travel limit.
alarms.quick_fix: Move axis in positive direction, check program

alarms.name: SAFETY DOOR OPEN DURING AUTO
alarms.description: Safety door was opened during automatic operation mode.
alarms.quick_fix: Close door and reset, check interlock switch

alarms.name: PROGRAM SYNTAX ERROR
alarms.description: Invalid syntax detected in NC program.
alarms.quick_fix: Check and correct program syntax

alarms.name: INVALID M CODE
alarms.description: Unrecognized or invalid M code in program.
alarms.quick_fix: Check M code reference for this machine

alarms.name: FILE SYSTEM FULL
alarms.description: The TNC cannot save any more files due to full storage.
alarms.quick_fix: Delete unnecessary files

alarms.name: FILE ALREADY EXISTS
alarms.description: Attempted to create a file with a name that already exists.
alarms.quick_fix: Use a different file name

alarms.name: NC OPERATING TEMP EXCEEDED
alarms.description: Control operating temperature has exceeded safe limits.
alarms.quick_fix: Check cabinet heat transfer, inspect fan

alarms.name: PLC ERROR MESSAGE
alarms.description: Error reported from PLC program - see machine documentation.
alarms.quick_fix: Refer to machine builder documentation

alarms.name: SERVO AXIS FOLLOWING ERROR
alarms.description: Servo axis position deviation exceeded allowable limit.
alarms.quick_fix: Check axis mechanics and servo system

alarms.name: AXIS DRIVE NOT READY
alarms.description: Axis drive has not signaled ready status.
alarms.quick_fix: Check drive status LEDs, verify power and safety

alarms.name: MOTOR ENCODER SIGNAL ERROR
alarms.description: Noise or error detected on motor encoder signal.
alarms.quick_fix: Check encoder connection and ground

alarms.name: MOTOR ENCODER AMPLITUDE HIGH
alarms.description: Motor encoder signal amplitude is too high.
alarms.quick_fix: Check motor encoder adjustment

alarms.name: SPINDLE SPEED NOT REACHED
alarms.description: Spindle did not reach commanded speed within timeout.
alarms.quick_fix: Check spindle load and drive

alarms.name: SPINDLE ORIENTATION TIMEOUT
alarms.description: Spindle orientation did not complete in allowed time.
alarms.quick_fix: Check orientation sensor and spindle brake

alarms.name: EMERGENCY STOP ACTIVE
alarms.description: Emergency stop button is pressed or safety relay opened.
alarms.quick_fix: Release E-stop and reset safety circuit

alarms.name: ZIP FILE CREATE ERROR
alarms.description: TNC was not able to create or close the zip file.
alarms.quick_fix: Try again, check disk space

alarms.name: KEY STUCK
alarms.description: One or more keys were pressed for more than 5 seconds.
alarms.quick_fix: Check keyboard, press SHIFT/CTRL/ALT

alarms.name: NETWORK DRIVE NOT RESPONDING
alarms.description: Network drive is no longer ready or not responding.
alarms.quick_fix: Check network connection

alarms.name: NOMINAL SPEED VALUE TOO HIGH
alarms.description: Calculated nominal speed value exceeds allowable limit.
alarms.quick_fix: Check spindle speed command in program

alarms.name: SPINDLE SERVO ERROR
alarms.description: Spindle servo drive has detected a fault - feedback error or connection issue.
alarms.quick_fix: Check encoder connections, reseat connectors

alarms.name: SPINDLE FEEDBACK ERROR 1
alarms.description: External encoder feedback error on spindle axis.
alarms.quick_fix: Check external encoder installation and cable

alarms.name: SPINDLE FEEDBACK ERROR 2
alarms.description: Secondary spindle feedback error - encoder signal abnormal.
alarms.quick_fix: Verify encoder wiring and parameter 13019

alarms.name: SERVO OVERCURRENT
alarms.description: Servo overcurrent detected during spindle speed change.
alarms.quick_fix: Check power supply, consider phase converter upgrade

alarms.name: REGENERATIVE RESISTANCE ALARM
alarms.description: Regenerative braking resistance alarm during spindle deceleration.
alarms.quick_fix: Replace amplifier if recurring

alarms.name: POWER UNBALANCE WARNING
alarms.description: Three-phase power balance exceeds 4% threshold.
alarms.quick_fix: Adjust phase converter, check utility power

alarms.name: EMERGENCY STOP ACTIVE
alarms.description: Emergency stop button pressed or safety circuit open.
alarms.quick_fix: Release E-stop and reset

alarms.name: AXIS SERVO ALARM
alarms.description: One or more axis servo drives have faulted.
alarms.quick_fix: Check servo amplifier display for specific error

alarms.name: SPINDLE MOTOR OVERHEAT
alarms.description: Spindle motor temperature exceeded safe operating limit.
alarms.quick_fix: Allow motor to cool, check cooling system

alarms.name: ATC MAGAZINE ERROR
alarms.description: Tool magazine failed to index to correct position.
alarms.quick_fix: Check magazine sensors and mechanism

alarms.name: SPINDLE TOOL CLAMP ERROR
alarms.description: Tool clamp/unclamp operation did not complete properly.
alarms.quick_fix: Check air pressure and drawbar mechanism

alarms.name: LUBRICATION ALARM
alarms.description: Automatic lubrication system has detected a fault.
alarms.quick_fix: Check lubricant level and pump operation

alarms.name: ATC ERROR SPINDLE ORIENT FAULT
alarms.description: Spindle failed to orient properly for tool change operation.
alarms.quick_fix: Enter ATC & Machine Diagnostics to clear, check orientation

alarms.name: ATC ERROR SPINDLE NEITHER CLAMPED NOR UNCLAMPED
alarms.description: Spindle clamp switches show neither clamped nor unclamped state.
alarms.quick_fix: Check clamping mechanism and switches

alarms.name: SERVO FAULT SPINDLE ALARM
alarms.description: Spindle axis has indicated a servo fault condition.
alarms.quick_fix: Check Control Bit31 wiring and S-axis servo

alarms.name: SERVO DRIVE FAULT ON AXIS
alarms.description: Servo drive has detected a fault on the specified axis.
alarms.quick_fix: Check drive amplifier alarm code, verify encoder harness

alarms.name: ATC TOOL CHANGE TIMEOUT
alarms.description: Tool change sequence did not complete within allowed time.
alarms.quick_fix: Check magazine position and air pressure

alarms.name: ATC MAGAZINE POSITION ERROR
alarms.description: Tool magazine is not in expected position for tool change.
alarms.quick_fix: Run ATC diagnostics, check sensors

alarms.name: LOW AIR PRESSURE ALARM
alarms.description: System air pressure has dropped below minimum required level.
alarms.quick_fix: Check compressor and air system

alarms.name: COOLANT LOW LEVEL ALARM
alarms.description: Coolant tank level has dropped below minimum threshold.
alarms.quick_fix: Refill coolant tank

alarms.name: LUBRICATION LOW LEVEL
alarms.description: Way lubrication reservoir is low on oil.
alarms.quick_fix: Refill way lube reservoir

alarms.name: DOOR INTERLOCK OPEN
alarms.description: Safety door is open and machine cannot operate in auto mode.
alarms.quick_fix: Close door securely, check interlock switch

alarms.name: AXIS OVERTRAVEL ALARM
alarms.description: Axis has exceeded its travel limit.
alarms.quick_fix: Jog axis back within limits

alarms.name: ASIN/ACOS RANGE EXCEEDED
alarms.description: Mathematical function received value outside valid range (-1 to 1).
alarms.quick_fix: Check program calculations

alarms.name: BLOCK CANNOT BE EXECUTED
alarms.description: Current block cannot be executed in present machine state.
alarms.quick_fix: Check machine mode and program sequence

alarms.name: DON'T PROGRAM G33,G95 OR M19 S WITHOUT SPINDLE ENCODER
alarms.description: Threaded or synchronized operation requires spindle encoder not present.
alarms.quick_fix: Install spindle encoder or change program

alarms.name: PROGRAMMED AXIS IS NOT LONGITUDINAL
alarms.description: Command requires longitudinal axis but specified axis is not configured as such.
alarms.quick_fix: Check axis configuration

alarms.name: WRONG PASSWORD
alarms.description: Entered password is incorrect for the protected operation.
alarms.quick_fix: Enter correct password

alarms.name: PASSWORD: USE UPPERCASE/LOWERCASE LETTERS OR DIGITS
alarms.description: Invalid character used in password - only letters and digits allowed.
alarms.quick_fix: Use only letters (A-Z, a-z) or digits (0-9)

alarms.name: AXIS OVERTRAVEL ERROR
alarms.description: Axis has exceeded programmed travel limit.
alarms.quick_fix: Move axis back within limits, check program

alarms.name: SPINDLE SPEED ABNORMAL
alarms.description: Spindle speed deviation or feedback error detected.
alarms.quick_fix: Check encoder, drive, and motor - may need replacement

alarms.name: POWER MATE ALARM
alarms.description: Tool magazine power mate (PMM) has reported an error.
alarms.quick_fix: Check batteries, perform zero return procedure

alarms.name: M-CODE COMBINATION ERROR
alarms.description: Invalid M-code combination programmed.
alarms.quick_fix: Separate M-codes into different blocks

alarms.name: SAFETY DOOR OPEN DURING OPERATION
alarms.description: Safety door opened while machine was in automatic operation.
alarms.quick_fix: Close door and reset

alarms.name: TURRET INDEX ERROR
alarms.description: Turret failed to index to commanded tool position.
alarms.quick_fix: Check position switches and turret mechanism

alarms.name: TURRET UNCLAMP ERROR
alarms.description: Turret failed to unclamp for indexing.
alarms.quick_fix: Check hydraulic pressure and clamp

alarms.name: SPINDLE ORIENTATION ERROR
alarms.description: Spindle did not orient properly for tool change or C-axis operation.
alarms.quick_fix: Check orientation sensor and brake

alarms.name: CHUCK CLAMP ERROR
alarms.description: Chuck failed to clamp workpiece properly.
alarms.quick_fix: Check hydraulic pressure and chuck mechanism

alarms.name: CHUCK UNCLAMP ERROR
alarms.description: Chuck failed to unclamp for part removal.
alarms.quick_fix: Check hydraulic system and chuck

alarms.name: TAILSTOCK ADVANCE ERROR
alarms.description: Tailstock failed to advance to programmed position.
alarms.quick_fix: Check hydraulic system and sensors

alarms.name: COOLANT PUMP OVERLOAD
alarms.description: Coolant pump thermal overload has tripped.
alarms.quick_fix: Check pump motor and coolant system

alarms.name: EMERGENCY BUTTON PRESSED OR OVERTRAVEL
alarms.description: Emergency stop button pressed or axis overtravel limit switch activated.
alarms.quick_fix: Release emergency button, check limit switches

alarms.name: MAIN SPINDLE MOTOR AND SERVO UNIT ALARM
alarms.description: Alarms from main spindle motor and servo unit detected.
alarms.quick_fix: Check alarm display on servo unit, power cycle

alarms.name: CONTROL POWER CIRCUIT OVERCURRENT
alarms.description: Abnormally large current detected in control power circuit.
alarms.quick_fix: Check for control power short circuit

alarms.name: HYDRAULIC PUMP MOTOR OVERLOAD
alarms.description: Hydraulic pump motor thermal overload has tripped.
alarms.quick_fix: Check thermal relay and motor

alarms.name: HYDRAULIC PRESSURE DOWN
alarms.description: Hydraulic system pressure has dropped below required level.
alarms.quick_fix: Check pressure switch, pressure value, and for leaks

alarms.name: SPINDLE ROTATION ABNORMAL
alarms.description: Spindle rotation is not normal - speed or direction error.
alarms.quick_fix: Check spindle drive and mechanical components

alarms.name: COOLANT PUMP MOTOR OVERLOAD
alarms.description: Coolant pump, lube pump, chip conveyor, or bar feeder overload detected.
alarms.quick_fix: Check Q11 relay for specific overload source

alarms.name: SPINDLE ORIENTATION TIMEOUT
alarms.description: Spindle orientation did not complete within 10 seconds.
alarms.quick_fix: Check orientation parameters and readjust

alarms.name: TOOL INDEX OVERTIME
alarms.description: Tool index operation exceeded time limit.
alarms.quick_fix: Check turret mechanism and sensors

alarms.name: TOOL NUMBER COMMAND ALARM
alarms.description: Invalid tool number commanded in program.
alarms.quick_fix: Check tool number in program

alarms.name: SPINDLE SPEED ARRIVAL NOT DETECTED
alarms.description: Spindle did not reach commanded speed within 7 seconds.
alarms.quick_fix: Check spindle servo unit

alarms.name: SPLASH GUARD DOOR OPEN
alarms.description: Splash guard door is open during operation.
alarms.quick_fix: Close door, check limit switches

alarms.name: SPINDLE STOP SIGNAL ALARM
alarms.description: Spindle drive unit error in stop signal.
alarms.quick_fix: Check spindle drive alarm number

alarms.name: SPINDLE SPEED ARRIVAL ALARM
alarms.description: Spindle failed to reach instructed speed within 20 seconds.
alarms.quick_fix: Check spindle parameters and drive alarm

alarms.name: SERVO TURRET BATTERY LOW
alarms.description: Turret servo amplifier battery is low - replace within 2 weeks.
alarms.quick_fix: Replace battery in amplifier module

alarms.name: TOOL FIX CHECK SWITCH ALARM
alarms.description: Tool fix confirmation switch not detecting proper state.
alarms.quick_fix: Check prox switch and turret servo batteries

alarms.name: SERVO ERROR - FEEDBACK ERROR 1
alarms.description: Servo axis feedback error type 1 detected.
alarms.quick_fix: Check encoder and cables

alarms.name: INITIAL PARAMETER ERROR
alarms.description: Error in initial servo/spindle parameters during startup.
alarms.quick_fix: Check and correct parameters

alarms.name: SERVO ERROR - FEEDBACK ERROR 2
alarms.description: Servo axis feedback error type 2 - secondary encoder issue.
alarms.quick_fix: Check encoder wiring and parameters

alarms.name: SERVO ERROR - OVERCURRENT
alarms.description: Servo overcurrent detected in drive amplifier.
alarms.quick_fix: Check motor and drive, may need replacement

alarms.name: SAFETY FUNCTION ERROR
alarms.description: Error in safety monitoring function.
alarms.quick_fix: Check safety circuit and parameters

alarms.name: PARAMETER ERROR
alarms.description: Invalid parameter value detected during operation.
alarms.quick_fix: Correct parameter value

alarms.name: SERVO WARNING
alarms.description: Non-critical servo warning - absolute position may be lost.
alarms.quick_fix: Check batteries, re-establish absolute position

alarms.name: ABSOLUTE POSITION LOST
alarms.description: Absolute position data has been lost and needs re-initialization.
alarms.quick_fix: Replace batteries, reset absolute position

alarms.name: F1-DIGIT SPINDLE ZERO
alarms.description: F1-digit feedrate is zero with spindle command.
alarms.quick_fix: Set F1 digit feed rate on user parameter screen

alarms.name: SPINDLE STOP
alarms.description: Spindle was stopped when movement command issued.
alarms.quick_fix: Rotate spindle, check encoder cables

alarms.name: HANDLE FEED NUMBER WRONG
alarms.description: Handle feed axis number is out of specification.
causes: Invalid axis selected for handle feed
alarms.quick_fix: Select valid axis for handle feed

alarms.name: SPINDLE SPEED EXCESSIVE
alarms.description: Commanded spindle speed exceeds axis clamp speed during threading.
causes: Speed too high for thread cutting
alarms.quick_fix: Reduce spindle speed

alarms.name: BLOCK START INTERLOCK
alarms.description: Block start interlock is active preventing execution.
alarms.quick_fix: Check and clear interlock condition

alarms.name: CUTTING BLOCK INTERLOCK
alarms.description: CT interlock is active during cutting operation.
alarms.quick_fix: Check Y19c and Y31c in PLC program

alarms.name: M01 HANDLE FEED AXIS ILLEGAL
alarms.description: Axis designated for handle feed is out of specification.
alarms.quick_fix: Select valid handle feed axis

alarms.name: STROKE END
alarms.description: Axis reached stroke end limit.
alarms.quick_fix: Move axis back within stroke limits

alarms.name: STORED STROKE LIMIT
alarms.description: Axis reached stored stroke limit boundary.
alarms.quick_fix: Check program coordinates and offsets

alarms.name: SERVO ALARM: n-TH AXIS OVERLOAD
alarms.description: Axis overload signal is on. Servo motor drawing excessive current due to mechanical load or electrical fault.
alarms.quick_fix: Check diagnosis display 720-727 for OVL bit. Reduce load or check mechanical system.

alarms.name: SERVO ALARM: n-TH AXIS VRDY OFF
alarms.description: Servo amplifier READY signal (DRDY) went off unexpectedly. Amplifier lost ready state.
alarms.quick_fix: Check amplifier LED display. Verify power connections. Reset amplifier.

alarms.name: SERVO ALARM: SV CARD NOT EXIST
alarms.description: Axis control card is not provided or not detected by system.
alarms.quick_fix: Verify servo card installation. Reseat card connections.

alarms.name: SERVO ALARM: CARD/SOFT MISMATCH
alarms.description: Combination of axis control card and servo software is incompatible.
alarms.quick_fix: Verify card type matches software requirements. Reinstall correct software.

alarms.name: SERVO ALARM: n-TH AXIS VRDY ON
alarms.description: Servo amplifier READY signal still on when it should be off. DRDY on even though MCON went off.
alarms.quick_fix: Check axis card to servo amplifier connection. Verify wiring integrity.

alarms.name: SERVO ALARM: ZERO POINT RETURN FAULT
alarms.description: Position control circuit error during reference position return operation.
alarms.quick_fix: Retry reference position return. Check encoder connections.

alarms.name: SERVO ALARM: EXCESS ERROR
alarms.description: Difference in synchronous axis position deviation exceeded set value.
alarms.quick_fix: Check synchronous axis alignment. Verify encoder counts match.

alarms.name: SERVO ALARM: n AXIS TORQUE ALM
alarms.description: Abnormal servo motor load detected. Motor torque exceeds threshold during operation.
alarms.quick_fix: Reduce cutting parameters. Check for mechanical interference.

alarms.name: SERVO ALARM: n-TH AXIS EXCESS ERROR (STOP)
alarms.description: Position deviation when axis stopped exceeds parameter setting. Following error too large at rest.
alarms.quick_fix: Check parameter 1829 (allowable error). Verify brake operation.

alarms.name: SERVO ALARM: n-TH AXIS EXCESS ERROR (MOVE)
alarms.description: Position deviation when axis moving exceeds parameter setting. Following error too large during motion.
alarms.quick_fix: Check parameter 1828 (allowable error). Reduce feed rate.

alarms.name: SERVO ALARM: n-TH AXIS LSI OVERFLOW
alarms.description: Digital servo LSI overflow error. Internal calculation overflow in servo processor.
alarms.quick_fix: Power cycle. If persistent, check servo parameters and software.

alarms.name: SERVO ALARM: n-TH AXIS DETECTION ERROR
alarms.description: Detection related error - high current, encoder fault, or drive fault detected.
alarms.quick_fix: Check diagnosis 200 row 16 for specific error. Replace faulty component.

alarms.name: SERVO ALARM: n-TH AXIS EXCESS SHIFT
alarms.description: Excessive position shift detected. Axis position drifted beyond acceptable range.
alarms.quick_fix: Re-establish reference position. Check mechanical couplings.

alarms.name: SERVO ALARM: n-TH AXIS DISCONNECTION
alarms.description: Encoder signal disconnection detected. Feedback cable or encoder fault.
alarms.quick_fix: Check encoder cable continuity. Verify connector seating.

alarms.name: SERVO ALARM: n-TH AXIS PARAMETER INCORRECT
alarms.description: Servo parameter setting is incorrect or incompatible with hardware.
alarms.quick_fix: Verify servo parameters match motor specifications. Restore from backup.

alarms.name: SERVO ALARM: n AXIS SYNC TORQUE
alarms.description: Synchronous torque alarm on tandem or gantry axis configuration.
alarms.quick_fix: Check tandem axis torque distribution. Verify mechanical alignment.

alarms.name: n AXIS: SV. MOTOR OVERHEAT
alarms.description: Servo motor thermal protection activated. Motor temperature exceeded limit.
alarms.quick_fix: Allow motor to cool. Check cooling system. Reduce duty cycle.

alarms.name: n AXIS: SOFTTHERMAL (OVC)
alarms.description: Software thermal protection - overcurrent protection activated in digital servo.
alarms.quick_fix: Check motor current vs rating. Verify servo parameters.

alarms.name: COMM. FAILURE WITH MOCON/MOCON MEMORY FAULT
alarms.description: Communication failure between main control and motion control board, or MOCON memory error.
alarms.quick_fix: Power cycle. Check MOCON cable connections. May require board replacement.

alarms.name: SERVOS OFF
alarms.description: Servo motors are off. Tool changer disabled, coolant off, spindle stopped.
alarms.quick_fix: Release E-Stop, close doors, verify air pressure, press RESET.

alarms.name: X SERVO ERROR TOO LARGE
alarms.description: X-axis position error exceeded parameter 9 X-axis Max Error. Cannot follow commanded position.
alarms.quick_fix: Lower rapid override to 25%. Jog axis slowly. Check for binding.

alarms.name: Y SERVO ERROR TOO LARGE
alarms.description: Y-axis position error exceeded parameter limit. Servo cannot follow commanded position.
alarms.quick_fix: Lower rapid override. Jog axis slowly. Check for mechanical issues.

alarms.name: Z SERVO ERROR TOO LARGE
alarms.description: Z-axis position error exceeded parameter limit. Following error too large.
alarms.quick_fix: Check Z counterbalance. Verify brake releases. Jog carefully.

alarms.name: A SERVO ERROR TOO LARGE
alarms.description: A-axis (rotary) position error exceeded parameter limit.
alarms.quick_fix: Check rotary table clearance. Verify brake operation.

alarms.name: EMERGENCY OFF
alarms.description: Emergency stop button was pressed.
alarms.quick_fix: Release E-Stop button. Reset machine.

alarms.name: X SERVO OVERLOAD
alarms.description: X-axis servo motor drawing excessive current. Thermal or current overload.
alarms.quick_fix: Allow motor to cool. Check for mechanical binding. Reduce load.

alarms.name: Y SERVO OVERLOAD
alarms.description: Y-axis servo motor thermal or current overload.
alarms.quick_fix: Allow motor to cool. Check for mechanical binding.

alarms.name: Z SERVO OVERLOAD
alarms.description: Z-axis servo motor thermal or current overload.
alarms.quick_fix: Check counterbalance. Allow motor to cool.

alarms.name: A SERVO OVERLOAD
alarms.description: A-axis servo motor thermal or current overload.
alarms.quick_fix: Check rotary table load. Allow motor to cool.

alarms.name: NO INTERRUPT
alarms.description: System interrupt not received. Control timing fault.
alarms.quick_fix: Power cycle. May require service call.

alarms.name: SHUTTLE IN FAULT (Mill)
alarms.description: Side-mount tool changer shuttle did not reach spindle position in time.
alarms.quick_fix: Check parameters 62/63. Verify shuttle motor operation. Clear obstruction.

alarms.name: TURRET UNLOCK FAULT (Lathe)
alarms.description: Lathe turret did not unlock within allowed time.
alarms.quick_fix: Check air pressure. Verify turret solenoid. Clear debris.

alarms.name: SHUTTLE OUT FAULT (Mill)
alarms.description: Side-mount tool changer shuttle did not retract from spindle.
alarms.quick_fix: Check shuttle motor. Verify tool release. Check clutch.

alarms.name: TURRET LOCK FAULT (Lathe)
alarms.description: Turret lock timeout - did not lock within Parameter 63 time.
alarms.quick_fix: Check air pressure. Adjust clamp switch. Check motor coupling.

alarms.name: TURRET ROTATE FAULT
alarms.description: Tool turret did not start moving or stop at correct position.
alarms.quick_fix: Check parameters 62/63. Verify turret motor. Check position sensor.

alarms.name: SPINDLE ORIENTATION FAULT
alarms.description: Spindle failed to orient (M19) within allowed time.
alarms.quick_fix: Check spindle encoder. Verify belt tension. Check orient sensor.

alarms.name: SPINDLE HIGH GEAR FAULT
alarms.description: High gear engagement failed during gear shift.
alarms.quick_fix: Stop spindle. Retry gear change. Check solenoid.

alarms.name: X DRIVE FAULT
alarms.description: X-axis servo amplifier detected fault condition (overcurrent, short, internal error).
alarms.quick_fix: Check amplifier LEDs. Verify motor connections. May need replacement.

alarms.name: Y DRIVE FAULT
alarms.description: Y-axis servo amplifier detected fault condition.
alarms.quick_fix: Check amplifier LEDs. Verify motor connections.

alarms.name: Z DRIVE FAULT
alarms.description: Z-axis servo amplifier detected fault condition.
alarms.quick_fix: Check amplifier LEDs. Verify motor connections.

alarms.name: A DRIVE FAULT
alarms.description: A-axis servo amplifier detected fault condition.
alarms.quick_fix: Check amplifier LEDs. Verify motor connections.

alarms.name: SPINDLE NOT TURNING
alarms.description: Spindle is not rotating when G99 (feed per revolution) mode active.
alarms.quick_fix: Check spindle drive. Verify encoder. Check belt tension.

alarms.name: VD OVER TEMP
alarms.description: Vector drive (spindle drive) over temperature alarm.
alarms.quick_fix: Check cooling fans. Allow drive to cool. Verify ventilation.

alarms.name: CHUCK SYSTEM MALFUNCTION
alarms.description: Erroneous chucking action detected during operation.
alarms.quick_fix: Verify chuck sensor. Check hydraulic pressure. Inspect chuck jaws.

alarms.name: TURRET POSITION SENSOR MALF
alarms.description: Milling head positioning or B-axis encoder signal invalid.
alarms.quick_fix: Check encoder connections. Verify encoder operation.

alarms.name: TOOL BREAKAGE DETECTED
alarms.description: Tool breakage detected during tool breakage detection cycle.
alarms.quick_fix: Replace broken tool. Update tool offsets. Check detection sensor.

alarms.name: TOOL EYE POSITION SENSOR MALF
alarms.description: Tool eye extension/retraction sensor (SQ7/SQ8) fault. Both sensors ON or neither ON.
alarms.quick_fix: Check tool eye sensors SQ7/SQ8. Verify arm movement.

alarms.name: SPINDLE START MISOPERATION
alarms.description: Spindle rotation command given during mis-chucking condition.
alarms.quick_fix: Close chuck and verify clamping. Check chuck sensor.

alarms.name: MILLING MOTOR ROTATION PROHIB
alarms.description: Milling spindle rotation prohibited due to safety condition.
alarms.quick_fix: Verify all interlocks satisfied. Check chuck and turret position.

alarms.name: TNo. MISMATCH
alarms.description: Tool number mismatch after ATC aborted by E-Stop during tool change.
alarms.quick_fix: Manually verify tool in spindle. Update tool register. Reset ATC.

alarms.name: SLIDEWAY LUBRICATION ALARM
alarms.description: Slideway lubrication pressure switch SP67 did not turn on in time.
alarms.quick_fix: Check grease level. Verify pump operation. Clear blockage.

alarms.name: PARTS CATCHER CYCLE EXCEED TIME
alarms.description: Parts catcher advance/retract did not complete within timeout.
alarms.quick_fix: Check air pressure. Verify cylinder operation. Check sensors.

alarms.name: NOT IN ATC START POSITION
alarms.description: Machine not in correct position for ATC operation.
causes: Axes not at tool change position
alarms.quick_fix: Move axes to proper ATC position. Check D200/D201 for details.

alarms.name: TAIL ALARM
alarms.description: Tailstock amplifier overload or excessive error. Tailstock moved during spindle rotation.
alarms.quick_fix: Stop spindle. Check tailstock position. Verify amplifier status.

alarms.name: ATC STOP
alarms.description: ATC STOP menu key pressed - axis movement stopped during ATC.
alarms.quick_fix: Deselect ATC STOP menu. Resume operation.

alarms.name: TOOL ON INTERFER ALARM
alarms.description: Attempt to return tool to pocket that already contains another tool.
alarms.quick_fix: Verify tool pocket status. Correct tool table data.

alarms.name: AUXILIARY FUNCTION DURING THREAD CUTTING ACTIVE
alarms.description: Auxiliary function (M-code) commanded while thread cutting is active.
alarms.quick_fix: Remove M-code from thread cutting block. Restructure program.

alarms.name: ZERO VELOCITY AT BLOCK END DURING THREAD CUTTING
alarms.description: Feed rate would be zero at end of thread cutting block.
alarms.quick_fix: Check thread lead and feedrate. Verify thread parameters.

alarms.name: THREAD LEAD INCREASE TOO HIGH
alarms.description: Variable lead thread pitch increase rate exceeds limit.
alarms.quick_fix: Reduce lead change rate. Verify thread parameters.

alarms.name: AXIS AT SOFTWARE LIMIT SWITCH
alarms.description: Axis reached software limit switch position during motion.
alarms.quick_fix: Jog axis away from limit. Check program and offsets.

alarms.name: AXIS RESTS ON SOFTWARE LIMIT SWITCH
alarms.description: Axis is currently at software limit position.
alarms.quick_fix: Jog axis in opposite direction away from limit.

alarms.name: AXIS AT WORKING AREA LIMIT
alarms.description: Axis reached programmed working area limit during motion.
alarms.quick_fix: Check working area limits (G25/G26). Modify program.

alarms.name: INCORRECT GANTRY MACHINE DATA
alarms.description: Gantry axis configuration machine data is invalid.
alarms.quick_fix: Verify gantry machine data. Restore correct parameters.

alarms.name: GANTRY WARNING THRESHOLD EXCEEDED
alarms.description: Position difference between gantry axes exceeded warning level.
alarms.quick_fix: Check gantry axis alignment. Verify mechanical system.

alarms.name: GANTRY ERROR THRESHOLD EXCEEDED
alarms.description: Position difference between gantry axes exceeded error limit. Motion stopped.
alarms.quick_fix: Stop machine. Check both gantry axes. Re-synchronize.

alarms.name: SENSOR MODULE SOFTWARE/HARDWARE INCOMPATIBLE
alarms.description: Sensor module firmware does not match drive software version.
alarms.quick_fix: Update sensor module firmware. Verify compatibility.

alarms.name: SI CU: ILLEGAL MONITORING CLOCK CYCLE
alarms.description: Safety integrated control unit monitoring cycle time error.
alarms.quick_fix: Check safety configuration. Verify communication settings.

alarms.name: ENCODER 1 CHANNEL A SIGNAL FAULT
alarms.description: Encoder channel A signal lost or invalid.
alarms.quick_fix: Check encoder cable. Verify encoder operation. Replace if needed.

alarms.name: P-RAM EXTENSION ERROR
alarms.description: Error in parameter RAM extension module.
alarms.quick_fix: Check memory module. May require hardware replacement.

alarms.name: DIF OVER (AXIS FOLLOW-UP ERROR)
alarms.description: Follow-up error exceeded permissible range (16384/2 um) three times in succession.
alarms.quick_fix: Check mechanical system. Verify encoder. Check drive unit.

alarms.name: I/O MAPPING ERROR
alarms.description: I/O mapping not properly configured. Often after option installation on GENOS.
alarms.quick_fix: Install I/O mapping DVD for GENOS. Verify option configuration.

alarms.name: SAFETY IO LINK ERROR
alarms.description: Problem in safety IO link. Shorted solenoid or switch exposed to coolant.
alarms.quick_fix: Check safety IO components. Look for coolant intrusion. Check error code for location.

alarms.name: MCS SERIAL LINK ERROR
alarms.description: Discrepancy in MCS system serial link during control boot-up.
alarms.quick_fix: Check drive unit. Verify controller ID addresses. Check servo cabling.

alarms.name: INVERTER FAULT
alarms.description: Inverter control board fault, motor overcurrent, voltage issue, or shorted motor.
alarms.quick_fix: Check inverter status. Verify motor windings. Check voltage.

alarms.name: CPU/POWER SUPPLY FAN FAULT
alarms.description: CPU fan or power supply fan not operating at specified threshold speed.
alarms.quick_fix: Inspect fans visually. Check connections. Replace slow/stopped fan.

alarms.name: MEMORY BOARD BATTERY DEPLETED
alarms.description: Battery backing up memory board is depleted or low.
alarms.quick_fix: Replace memory board battery. Save parameters first.

alarms.name: APA OVERSPEED ERROR
alarms.description: Axis servo overspeed detected by APA system.
alarms.quick_fix: Stop machine immediately. Check encoder. Verify parameters.

alarms.name: MCS EXCEPTION PROCESSING ERROR
alarms.description: MCS system detected exception condition during processing.
alarms.quick_fix: Power cycle. If persistent, check MCS hardware and software.

alarms.name: MCS MAGNETIC ENCODER ALARM
alarms.description: Magnetic encoder signal error detected by MCS system.
alarms.quick_fix: Check encoder gap. Clean encoder. Verify cable connections.

alarms.name: MCS MOTOR OVER-CURRENT ALARM
alarms.description: Motor over-current detected by MCS drive system.
alarms.quick_fix: Check motor windings. Verify cabling. Reduce load.

alarms.name: SERVO FAULT - SPINDLE ALARM
alarms.description: Spindle axis has indicated a fault from the servo drive amplifier
causes: Connector loose at motor or drive
alarms.quick_fix: Check encoder connector at spindle motor, reseat and retry. Verify alarm code on drive amplifier display

alarms.name: SPINDLE FAULT - WINDING NOT COMPLETED
alarms.description: Servo drive amplifier did not properly change to Low or High winding configuration
causes: Wiring issue between control and motor
alarms.quick_fix: Check winding relay operation, verify contactor engagement, check drive parameters

alarms.name: SPINDLE FAULT - NOT AT SPEED
alarms.description: Spindle speed feedback did not achieve commanded speed within specified time frame
alarms.quick_fix: Check spindle belt tension, verify no mechanical binding, check motor and drive

alarms.name: SPINDLE FAULT - ORIENT ERROR
alarms.description: Proximity sensor or marker not detected during orient sequence, or spindle did not rotate to specified angle
alarms.quick_fix: Check proximity sensor, verify orient parameters, check encoder marker pulse

alarms.name: SERVO FAULT - I/R FAULT
alarms.description: I/R (Isolation/Resistance) fault detected in servo system
alarms.quick_fix: Check motor insulation resistance, inspect cables for damage, verify grounding

alarms.name: SERVO DRIVE FAULT ON AXIS
alarms.description: Servo drive amplifier has indicated a fault condition for specified axis
alarms.quick_fix: Check alarm on drive display, verify encoder connections, check motor power cables

alarms.name: SPINDLE OVERLOAD DETECTED
alarms.description: Maximum load on spindle exceeded rated limit
alarms.quick_fix: Reduce cutting parameters, check tool condition, verify workpiece material

alarms.name: SPINDLE FAULT - SPEED CHANGE TIMEOUT
alarms.description: Spindle did not reach targeted RPM within allowable time
alarms.quick_fix: Check spindle mechanics, verify belt tension, reduce speed if necessary

alarms.name: SERVO FAULT - C AXIS
alarms.description: C-axis servo fault detected
alarms.quick_fix: Check C-axis encoder, verify connections, inspect drive amplifier

alarms.name: ATC ARM MALFUNCTION
alarms.description: Automatic tool changer arm failed to complete motion sequence
alarms.quick_fix: Check air pressure, verify sensor positions, inspect for tool or debris interference

alarms.name: TOOL MAGAZINE POSITION ERROR
alarms.description: Tool magazine did not reach commanded pocket position
alarms.quick_fix: Check magazine index sensors, verify motor operation, inspect for obstructions

alarms.name: TOOL CLAMP/UNCLAMP ERROR
alarms.description: Tool clamp or unclamp operation did not complete properly
alarms.quick_fix: Check air pressure, clean collet area, verify drawbar spring tension

alarms.name: MAIN SPINDLE SERVO ALARM
alarms.description: Error from main spindle drive unit detected
alarms.quick_fix: Check alarm number on spindle drive display in electrical cabinet, refer to spindle amplifier troubleshooting

alarms.name: CIRCUIT PROTECTOR TRIP
alarms.description: Circuit protector in electrical cabinet has tripped
alarms.quick_fix: Identify tripped circuit protector (QF22 etc), check secondary circuit for short, measure contact resistance

alarms.name: HYD. PRESSURE DOWN ALARM
alarms.description: Hydraulic pressure below minimum operating threshold
alarms.quick_fix: Check hydraulic oil level, inspect for leaks, verify pump operation, clean/replace filter

alarms.name: MAIN POWER PHASE & ATC SWITCH ALARM
alarms.description: Main power phase error or ATC switch problem detected
alarms.quick_fix: Check incoming power phases, verify ATC switch operation, check wiring

alarms.name: PSM CONTACT CHECK ERROR
alarms.description: Power supply module contact check failed
alarms.quick_fix: Check PSM contactor operation, verify auxiliary contacts, inspect wiring

alarms.name: AIR PRESSURE DOWN ALARM
alarms.description: Compressed air pressure below minimum operating threshold
alarms.quick_fix: Check air pressure at main supply, inspect for leaks, verify compressor operation

alarms.name: SPINDLE STOP SIGNAL ALARM
alarms.description: Error in spindle stop signal from drive unit
alarms.quick_fix: Check drive alarm display, verify spindle motor connections, check feedback cable

alarms.name: SPINDLE SPEED ARRIVAL ALARM
alarms.description: Spindle failed to reach instructed RPM within 20 seconds
alarms.quick_fix: Check spindle parameters N3700-N4175, verify drive alarm, inspect belt and mechanics

alarms.name: SPINDLE ROTATION MALFUNCTION
alarms.description: Spindle rotation detected abnormal behavior
alarms.quick_fix: Check spindle encoder, inspect motor bearings, verify drive operation

alarms.name: SPINDLE ORIENTATION OVERTIME
alarms.description: Spindle orientation did not complete within time limit
alarms.quick_fix: Check orient sensor, verify encoder operation, check orient parameters

alarms.name: SPINDLE TOOL CL/UNCL OVERTIME
alarms.description: Tool clamp/unclamp operation exceeded time limit
alarms.quick_fix: Check air pressure, inspect tool clamp mechanism, verify sensors

alarms.name: TOOL NO. SELECT KEEP RELAY NOT SET
alarms.description: Tool number selection keep relay failed to set properly
alarms.quick_fix: Check PLC ladder program, verify relay operation, check magazine position

alarms.name: TOOL SEARCH ILLEGAL POSITION
alarms.description: Tool magazine search found illegal or unexpected position
alarms.quick_fix: Verify tool data, check magazine sensors, inspect for mechanical issues

alarms.name: M06 COMMAND ILLEGAL POSITION
alarms.description: Tool change command issued when spindle not in legal ATC position
alarms.quick_fix: Move spindle to ATC position, verify position sensors, check program

alarms.name: TOOL MAG. ROTATION OVER TIME
alarms.description: Tool magazine rotation exceeded time limit
alarms.quick_fix: Check magazine motor, inspect for obstructions, verify sensors and drive mechanism

alarms.name: INSUFFICIENT VOLTAGE
alarms.description: Bus voltage drop detected in main circuit of drive unit
alarms.quick_fix: Check input power stability, verify regenerative resistor, reduce rapid deceleration loads

alarms.name: AXIS SELECTION ERROR
alarms.description: Axis selection rotary switch set incorrectly on drive unit
alarms.quick_fix: Verify axis selection switch on drive unit, ensure no duplicate axis numbers

alarms.name: SUB SIDE ENCODER ERROR 5
alarms.description: Error detected by encoder connected to machine side (linear scale/external encoder)
alarms.quick_fix: Clean scale, check cable connections, verify encoder operation, check for electrical noise

alarms.name: FEEDBACK ERROR 3
alarms.description: Missed feedback pulse or Z-phase error in full closed loop system
alarms.quick_fix: Check encoder/scale condition, verify cable routing, check for electrical interference

alarms.name: SAFELY LIMITED SPEED MONITORING ERROR
alarms.description: Commanded speed exceeding safely limited speed in safety mode
alarms.quick_fix: Reduce commanded speed, verify safety parameters, check SLS configuration

alarms.name: POWER MODULE OVERCURRENT
alarms.description: Overcurrent protection in power module activated
alarms.quick_fix: Check motor insulation, verify power cables, reduce load if mechanical

alarms.name: FREQUENCY ERROR
alarms.description: Input power supply frequency exceeded specification range
alarms.quick_fix: Check power supply frequency, verify with power company, check generator if applicable

alarms.name: PROCESS ERROR
alarms.description: Error in drive unit process cycle
alarms.quick_fix: Power cycle drive unit, if persistent replace drive

alarms.name: SPINDLE ROTATION SPEED OVER
alarms.description: Spindle rotation speed exceeded axis clamp speed during thread cutting
causes: Thread pitch too fine for RPM
alarms.quick_fix: Lower commanded rotation speed, verify thread pitch and RPM relationship

alarms.name: BLOCK START INTERLOCK
alarms.description: Interlock signal input to lock block start
alarms.quick_fix: Check interlock conditions in sequence program, verify safety guards

alarms.name: CUTTING BLOCK START INTERLOCK
alarms.description: Interlock signal input to lock cutting block start
alarms.quick_fix: Check interlock signals, verify cutting conditions met in PLC

alarms.name: DON'T PROGRAM G33/G95/M19 WITHOUT SPINDLE ENCODER
alarms.description: Threading, feed per rev, or orient commanded without spindle encoder installed
alarms.quick_fix: Install spindle encoder or remove G33/G95/M19 commands from program

alarms.name: X AXIS FOLLOWING ERROR BEYOND LIMITS
alarms.description: X-axis position error exceeded parameter P21/P22 limit
alarms.quick_fix: Verify axis can move freely by hand with power off, check motor and encoder connections

alarms.name: Y AXIS FOLLOWING ERROR BEYOND LIMITS
alarms.description: Y-axis position error exceeded parameter P21/P22 limit
alarms.quick_fix: Verify axis can move freely by hand with power off, check motor and encoder connections

alarms.name: Z AXIS FOLLOWING ERROR BEYOND LIMITS
alarms.description: Z-axis position error exceeded parameter P21/P22 limit
alarms.quick_fix: Verify axis can move freely, check counterweight, motor and encoder connections

alarms.name: TRAVEL LIMITS OF SPINDLE 1 EXCEEDED
alarms.description: Spindle 1 position/speed limits exceeded
alarms.quick_fix: Reduce spindle speed, verify spindle parameters

alarms.name: ASIN/ACOS RANGE EXCEEDED
alarms.description: Arc sine or arc cosine calculation produced result outside valid range
alarms.quick_fix: Check program calculation, ensure input values are between -1 and 1

alarms.name: TOOL CHANGE PROGRAMMED WITH SPINDLE RUNNING
alarms.description: M06 tool change commanded while spindle is still rotating
alarms.quick_fix: Add M05 spindle stop before M06 tool change command

alarms.name: NO F HAS BEEN PROGRAMMED
alarms.description: Feed rate command F not programmed before motion command
alarms.quick_fix: Add F feedrate command to program

alarms.name: NESTING EXCEEDED
alarms.description: Subroutine nesting depth exceeded maximum allowed
alarms.quick_fix: Reduce subroutine nesting levels, flatten program structure

alarms.name: TOOL RADIUS COMPENSATION NOT POSSIBLE
alarms.description: Cutter compensation cannot be applied as programmed
alarms.quick_fix: Use smaller tool, modify approach, or reprogram contour

alarms.name: TM FORWARD SENSOR ALARM
alarms.description: Tool magazine forward sensor not detecting expected position
alarms.quick_fix: Check sensor operation, verify magazine position, inspect for obstructions

alarms.name: TM BACKWARD SENSOR ALARM
alarms.description: Tool magazine backward sensor not detecting expected position
alarms.quick_fix: Check sensor operation, verify magazine position, inspect for obstructions

alarms.name: SPINDLE UP SENSOR ALARM
alarms.description: Spindle head up position sensor not detected
alarms.quick_fix: Verify Z-axis position, check spindle head up sensor

alarms.name: TM SERVO ALARM
alarms.description: Tool magazine servo motor alarm
alarms.quick_fix: Check for magazine obstruction, verify motor and drive

alarms.name: TOOL NUMBER INCORRECT
alarms.description: Tool number in spindle does not match expected tool
alarms.quick_fix: Verify tool data, perform tool data reset if necessary

alarms.name: LOW BATTERY
alarms.description: Backup battery voltage low - position data at risk
alarms.quick_fix: Replace backup battery immediately to preserve position data

alarms.name: PROCESSOR CHECK ERROR
alarms.description: CRC sum error for control data (datum point etc.)
alarms.quick_fix: Restore data from backup, check battery, may need service

alarms.name: MEMORY FULL
alarms.description: Cannot save any more files - memory full
alarms.quick_fix: Delete unnecessary files, archive programs to external storage

alarms.name: FILE ALREADY EXISTS
alarms.description: Attempted to create a file that already exists
alarms.quick_fix: Use different filename or delete existing file

alarms.name: DATA TRANSMISSION ERROR
alarms.description: Error during data transfer via DNC
alarms.quick_fix: Check data cable, verify communication settings, retry transfer

alarms.name: TNC OPERATING TEMP EXCEEDED
alarms.description: Control unit internal temperature too high
alarms.quick_fix: Check heat transfer in electrical cabinet, verify fans operating, clean filters

alarms.name: PLC ERROR
alarms.description: Error message from PLC - see machine documentation
alarms.quick_fix: Refer to machine builder documentation, check PLC diagnostics

alarms.name: FK REFERENCE ERROR
alarms.description: Invalid free contour (FK) reference in program
alarms.quick_fix: Check FK reference definition in program

alarms.name: CALCULATED LABEL TOO LARGE
alarms.description: Computed label number exceeds valid range
alarms.quick_fix: Edit program to correct label calculation

alarms.name: SCALING FACTOR TOO LARGE
alarms.description: Computed scaling factor exceeds allowable range
alarms.quick_fix: Reduce scaling factor to valid range

alarms.name: MAIN SPINDLE SERVO ALARM
alarms.description: Spindle drive unit fault
alarms.quick_fix: Check alarm on spindle drive display, verify motor connections

alarms.name: WAIT POT NO. = SPINDLE POT NO.
alarms.description: Tool wait position conflicts with spindle pot number
alarms.quick_fix: Verify tool data, check ATC sequence, may need ATC reset

alarms.name: TOOL MAG. ROTATION OVER TIME
alarms.description: Tool magazine failed to rotate to position within time limit
alarms.quick_fix: Check magazine motor, inspect for obstructions, verify sensors

alarms.name: TOOL MAGAZINE SERVO BATTERY ALARM
alarms.description: Magazine servo position backup battery depleted
alarms.quick_fix: Replace magazine servo battery, may need magazine zero return

alarms.name: ATC MAG POT TOOL OUT SW. ALARM
alarms.description: Tool out switch in magazine pot indicates unexpected state
alarms.quick_fix: Check tool seating in pocket, verify sensor operation

alarms.name: SPINDLE STOP ERROR
alarms.description: Spindle stopped unexpectedly during operation
alarms.quick_fix: Check spindle drive for alarm, verify no overload condition

alarms.name: n AXIS: FSSB DISCONNECT
alarms.description: FSSB (FANUC Serial Servo Bus) communication disconnected from axis
alarms.quick_fix: Check fiber optic cables, verify amplifier power, reseat optical connectors

alarms.name: n AXIS: ILLEGAL AMP INTERFACE
alarms.description: Illegal amplifier interface detected - amplifier type mismatch
alarms.quick_fix: Verify amplifier model matches parameters, check axis configuration

alarms.name: n AXIS: SEND CNC DATA FAILED
alarms.description: Failed to send data from CNC to servo amplifier
alarms.quick_fix: Check FSSB connections, verify grounding, inspect cable routing

alarms.name: n AXIS: SEND SLAVE DATA FAILED
alarms.description: Failed to send data to slave device on FSSB
alarms.quick_fix: Check slave device power and connections, verify FSSB chain

alarms.name: n AXIS: WRITE ID DATA FAILED
alarms.description: Failed to write identification data to servo amplifier
alarms.quick_fix: Retry after power cycle, may need amplifier replacement if persistent

alarms.name: n AXIS: READ ID DATA FAILED
alarms.description: Failed to read identification data from servo amplifier
alarms.quick_fix: Check connections, power cycle, may need amplifier service

alarms.name: n AXIS: MOTOR/AMP COMBINATION
alarms.description: Motor and amplifier combination mismatch
alarms.quick_fix: Verify motor model matches amplifier rating, check axis parameters

alarms.name: n AXIS: ILLEGAL SETTING OF AXIS
alarms.description: Illegal axis setting in parameters
alarms.quick_fix: Check axis parameters, verify no duplicate assignments

alarms.name: n AXIS: HI HRV SETTING ERROR (AMP)
alarms.description: High-response vector control setting error in amplifier
alarms.quick_fix: Verify HRV settings, check amplifier supports high-response mode

alarms.name: OVER TRAVEL: +n
alarms.description: Positive overtravel limit exceeded on axis n
alarms.quick_fix: Jog axis in negative direction, verify reference position, check limit switches

alarms.name: OVER TRAVEL: -n
alarms.description: Negative overtravel limit exceeded on axis n
alarms.quick_fix: Jog axis in positive direction, verify reference position, check limit switches

alarms.name: OVERHEAT: CONTROL UNIT
alarms.description: CNC control unit internal temperature too high
alarms.quick_fix: Check cooling fans, clean filters, verify cabinet ventilation

alarms.name: OVERHEAT: FAN MOTOR
alarms.description: Cooling fan motor overheating or not running
alarms.quick_fix: Replace cooling fan, check for obstructions

alarms.name: OVERHEAT: SPINDLE
alarms.description: Spindle motor or drive overheating
alarms.quick_fix: Reduce load, check spindle cooling, allow motor to cool

alarms.name: RIGID TAP ALARM: EXCESS ERROR
alarms.description: Rigid tapping position error exceeded during tapping cycle
alarms.quick_fix: Check tap condition, verify rigid tap parameters, inspect encoder

alarms.name: SPINDLE SERIAL LINK START FAULT
