alarms.description: Serial communication startup with spindle amplifier failed
alarms.quick_fix: Check spindle amplifier power and connections, verify communication cable

alarms.name: n AXIS: INV. DC LINK OVER CURRENT
alarms.description: DC link overcurrent detected in inverter for axis n
alarms.quick_fix: Check motor insulation, verify power cables, may need amplifier replacement

alarms.name: n AXIS: INV. RADIATOR FAN FAILURE
alarms.description: Inverter radiator cooling fan failure for axis n
alarms.quick_fix: Check and replace cooling fan on amplifier

alarms.name: n AXIS: INV. OVERHEAT
alarms.description: Inverter/amplifier overheating for axis n
alarms.quick_fix: Allow amplifier to cool, check cooling system, reduce duty cycle

alarms.name: PLC CYCLIC TIMEOUT
alarms.description: PLC did not give sign of life within defined time (MD10100)
alarms.quick_fix: Analyze ISTACK for PLC error, check monitoring time MD10100, restart control

alarms.name: PLC RUNNINGUP TIMEOUT
alarms.description: PLC did not complete startup within timeout period
alarms.quick_fix: Check PLC startup, adjust PLC_RUNNINGUP_TIMEOUT, verify hardware

alarms.name: NCK BATTERY PREWARNING
alarms.description: NCK battery voltage at prewarning threshold (2.7-2.9V)
alarms.quick_fix: Replace battery within 6 weeks - data still safe but declining

alarms.name: NCK BATTERY ALARM
alarms.description: NCK battery voltage below alarm limit (2.4-2.6V) during operation
alarms.quick_fix: Replace battery immediately without power interruption to prevent data loss

alarms.name: NCK BATTERY ALARM AT POWER-UP
alarms.description: NCK battery voltage below limit detected at startup - data may be lost
alarms.quick_fix: Replace battery, reinitialize system, restore data from backup

alarms.name: NC MODULE TEMPERATURE
alarms.description: Temperature sensor reached response threshold (60°C)
alarms.quick_fix: Reduce temperature by 7°C to reset, check cooling system

alarms.name: NC MODULE FAN FAILURE
alarms.description: Fan speed monitoring responded - fan below 7500 rpm
alarms.quick_fix: Replace fan/battery module, module may auto-shutdown to prevent damage

alarms.name: 5V/24V ENCODER OR 15V D/A UNDERVOLTAGE
alarms.description: Power supply failure to encoder (5V/24V) or D/A converter (±15V)
alarms.quick_fix: Check power supply module, verify no short circuits

alarms.name: SRAM CLEAR FORCED AT NEXT POWER ON
alarms.description: Initialization switch set to general reset - SRAM will be cleared
alarms.quick_fix: Change initialization switch position before restart if reset not intended

alarms.name: EMERGENCY STOP
alarms.description: Emergency stop request on NCK/PLC interface DB10 DBX56.1
alarms.quick_fix: Remove E-stop cause, acknowledge via DB10 DBX56.2

alarms.name: SRAM BACKUP USED
alarms.description: SRAM inconsistency detected - backup copy used, recent changes lost
alarms.quick_fix: Manually update tool/workpiece data to current machine status

alarms.name: NEGATIVE MAX SPINDLE SPEED PROGRAMMED
alarms.description: Negative value programmed for maximum spindle speed with CSS
alarms.quick_fix: Correct program to use positive spindle speed value

alarms.name: P-RAM EXTENSION ERROR
alarms.description: Error in P-RAM extension module
alarms.quick_fix: Check P-RAM module connection, may need replacement

alarms.name: DIF OVER - FOLLOW-UP ERROR
alarms.description: Servo follow-up error exceeded limit
alarms.quick_fix: Check axis mechanics, verify motor and encoder, inspect drive

alarms.name: I/O MAPPING ERROR
alarms.description: I/O mapping configuration error - often DVD drive issue on GENOS
alarms.quick_fix: Remove USB devices, check I/O configuration, rebuild mapping

alarms.name: SAFETY IO LINK ERROR
alarms.description: Safety I/O communication link error
alarms.quick_fix: Check safety I/O connections, verify safety module operation

alarms.name: MCS SERIAL LINK ERROR
alarms.description: MCS (Motion Control System) serial communication error
alarms.quick_fix: Check MCS communication cables, verify MCS unit power

alarms.name: INVERTER FAULT
alarms.description: Inverter/drive unit fault detected
alarms.quick_fix: Check drive display for specific alarm, may need drive replacement

alarms.name: CPU/POWER SUPPLY FAN FAULT
alarms.description: Cooling fan fault on CPU or power supply unit
alarms.quick_fix: Replace faulty fan, clean filter, check for obstructions

alarms.name: MEMORY BOARD BATTERY DEPLETED
alarms.description: Backup battery on memory board voltage low
alarms.quick_fix: Replace memory board battery before data loss occurs

alarms.name: MCS EXCEPTION PROCESSING
alarms.description: MCS encountered exception processing error
alarms.quick_fix: Power cycle, check MCS unit, may need service

alarms.name: MCS MAGNETIC ENCODER ALARM
alarms.description: MCS detected magnetic encoder fault
alarms.quick_fix: Clean encoder, check cables, verify encoder operation

alarms.name: MCS MOTOR OVER-CURRENT
alarms.description: MCS detected motor overcurrent condition
alarms.quick_fix: Check motor insulation, verify axis free movement, reduce load

alarms.name: NC SYSTEM ERROR
alarms.description: General NC system error - internal fault
alarms.quick_fix: Power cycle, note exact error details for service

alarms.name: ROM PARITY ERROR
alarms.description: ROM memory parity check failed
alarms.quick_fix: May need ROM replacement or firmware reload

alarms.name: ILLEGAL COMMAND
alarms.description: Illegal or unsupported NC command in program
alarms.quick_fix: Check program syntax, verify command is supported

alarms.name: ILLEGAL ADDRESS
alarms.description: Invalid address letter in program block
alarms.quick_fix: Check address letters in program block

alarms.name: ATC SYSTEM ERROR
alarms.description: Automatic tool changer system error
alarms.quick_fix: Check ATC mechanism, verify sensors, may need ATC reset

alarms.name: ATC ARM POSITION ERROR
alarms.description: ATC arm not in correct position
alarms.quick_fix: Check arm position sensors, inspect for obstructions

alarms.name: SERVO SYSTEM ERROR - X
alarms.description: Servo system error on X axis
alarms.quick_fix: Check X-axis drive display, verify motor and encoder

alarms.name: SERVO SYSTEM ERROR - Y
alarms.description: Servo system error on Y axis
alarms.quick_fix: Check Y-axis drive display, verify motor and encoder

alarms.name: SERVO SYSTEM ERROR - Z
alarms.description: Servo system error on Z axis
alarms.quick_fix: Check Z-axis drive display, verify motor and encoder

alarms.name: SUB PROG WITHOUT M99
alarms.description: Subprogram called without M99 return code at end
causes: Missing M99 at end of subprogram
alarms.quick_fix: Add M99 code to end of program called as subroutine. Check program structure.

alarms.name: ATM CRC ERROR
alarms.description: Advanced Tool Management variables lost, possibly due to low battery
alarms.quick_fix: Check for low battery alarm. Replace battery if needed. Re-enter ATM data.

alarms.name: DELAY TIME RANGE ERROR
alarms.description: P code in G04 exceeds 999.999 seconds or invalid M95 time format
alarms.quick_fix: Reduce dwell time to under 1000 seconds. Check P code format.

alarms.name: QUEUE FULL
alarms.description: Motion command queue overflow - internal processor error
alarms.quick_fix: Cycle power on machine. If recurring, contact dealer.

alarms.name: G04 WITHOUT P CODE
alarms.description: Dwell command G04 programmed without P value for time
alarms.quick_fix: Add Pn.n for seconds or Pn for milliseconds to G04 command.

alarms.name: NO LOOP FOR M CODE EXCEPT M97, 98
alarms.description: L code specified with M code that doesn't support looping
causes: L code used with incompatible M code
alarms.quick_fix: Remove L code from line. L code only valid with M97, M98.

alarms.name: INVALID TOOL NUMBER
alarms.description: Tool number exceeds maximum defined in Parameter 65
alarms.quick_fix: Verify tool number is between 1 and Parameter 65 limit.

alarms.name: UNDEFINED M CODE
alarms.description: M code not recognized by control
alarms.quick_fix: Check M code validity. Verify options are enabled if required.

alarms.name: RANGE ERROR
alarms.description: Value in program exceeds allowable range
alarms.quick_fix: Check program values against machine limits.

alarms.name: H AND T NOT MATCHED
alarms.description: Height offset H code doesn't match tool number T
causes: H offset different from T number
alarms.quick_fix: Match H offset number to T tool number, or disable Setting 15.

alarms.name: X AXIS DISABLED
alarms.description: X axis servo disabled - cannot execute X motion
alarms.quick_fix: Clear alarms, re-enable servos, home X axis.

alarms.name: Y AXIS DISABLED
alarms.description: Y axis servo disabled - cannot execute Y motion
alarms.quick_fix: Clear alarms, re-enable servos, home Y axis.

alarms.name: GOTO OR P LINE NOT FOUND
alarms.description: GOTO command references line number that doesn't exist
alarms.quick_fix: Verify target N number exists in program.

alarms.name: CUTTER COMP END WITH G02 OR G03
alarms.description: Attempted to cancel cutter compensation on arc move
alarms.quick_fix: Cancel cutter comp (G40) on linear move before arc.

alarms.name: CUTTER COMP PATH TOO SMALL
alarms.description: Move distance too small for cutter compensation offset
alarms.quick_fix: Increase move distance or reduce tool offset.

alarms.name: CUTTER COMP WITH G18 AND G19
alarms.description: Cutter compensation attempted in XZ or YZ plane (Mill)
alarms.quick_fix: Select G17 (XY plane) before cutter compensation.

alarms.name: SKIP SIGNAL DURING RESTART
alarms.description: Skip signal active during program restart operation
alarms.quick_fix: Clear skip condition before restart. Check probe status.

alarms.name: INVALID TANGENT IN GROUP 1
alarms.description: Invalid tangent calculation for corner rounding or chamfering
alarms.quick_fix: Check geometry allows tangent calculation. Modify corner values.

alarms.name: POSSIBLE CORRUPTED FILE
alarms.description: Program file appears to be corrupted
alarms.quick_fix: Re-load program from backup. Check file integrity.

alarms.name: TOO MANY PROGS
alarms.description: Maximum number of programs in memory exceeded
alarms.quick_fix: Delete unused programs to make room.

alarms.name: RS-232 NO PROG NAME
alarms.description: Program received via RS-232 has no O number
alarms.quick_fix: Add O number to program file header.

alarms.name: RS-232 ILLEGAL PROG NAME
alarms.description: Program O number is invalid format
alarms.quick_fix: Use valid O number format (O0001-O9999).

alarms.name: RS-232 MISSING CODE
alarms.description: Expected G/M/X/Y/Z code missing in received data
alarms.quick_fix: Check RS-232 settings. Re-send program.

alarms.name: RS-232 INVALID CODE
alarms.description: Unrecognized code received via RS-232
alarms.quick_fix: Check cabling and RS-232 settings. Shield cables from noise.

alarms.name: RS-232 NUMBER RANGE ERROR
alarms.description: Numeric value in received data out of range
alarms.quick_fix: Check program values are within machine limits.

alarms.name: FILE INVALID N CODE
alarms.description: N code (sequence number) invalid in file
alarms.quick_fix: Check N number format in program.

alarms.name: FILE INVALID V CODE
alarms.description: V code invalid in file transfer
alarms.quick_fix: Check V code format and range.

alarms.name: RS-232 EMPTY PROG
alarms.description: Received program file is empty
alarms.quick_fix: Verify source file has content. Re-send.

alarms.name: RS-232 UNEXPECTED END OF INPUT
alarms.description: File ended without proper termination
alarms.quick_fix: Check file has proper end code. Re-send complete file.

alarms.name: RS-232 LOAD INSUFFICIENT MEMORY
alarms.description: Not enough memory to load incoming program
alarms.quick_fix: Delete unused programs. Check program size.

alarms.name: RS-232 BUFFER OVERFLOW
alarms.description: Receive buffer overflowed during RS-232 transfer
alarms.quick_fix: Enable XON/XOFF handshaking. Reduce baud rate.

alarms.name: RS-232 OVERRUN
alarms.description: UART overrun - data arriving faster than can be processed
alarms.quick_fix: Check baud rate settings. Enable hardware flow control.

alarms.name: X PHASING ERROR
alarms.description: Error in phasing initialization of X axis brushless motor
alarms.quick_fix: Check encoder and cabling. Contact dealer if persists.

alarms.name: Y PHASING ERROR
alarms.description: Error in phasing initialization of Y axis brushless motor
alarms.quick_fix: Check encoder and cabling. Contact dealer if persists.

alarms.name: Z PHASING ERROR
alarms.description: Error in phasing initialization of Z axis brushless motor
alarms.quick_fix: Check encoder and cabling. Contact dealer if persists.

alarms.name: A PHASING ERROR
alarms.description: Error in phasing initialization of A axis brushless motor
alarms.quick_fix: Check encoder and cabling. Contact dealer if persists.

alarms.name: CALIBRATION FAILED
alarms.description: Amplifier failed to self-calibrate within 30 seconds
alarms.quick_fix: Cycle power. Check motor and encoder connections.

alarms.name: AMPLIFIER OVER TEMPERATURE
alarms.description: Amplifier temperature sensor indicates over 90°C near power transistors
alarms.quick_fix: Allow cooling. Check fans and airflow. Reduce load.

alarms.name: AMPLIFIER OVER CURRENT
alarms.description: Amplifier detected excessive current going to motor
alarms.quick_fix: Check for mechanical binding. Inspect motor cables for shorts.

alarms.name: AMPLIFIER SHORT CIRCUIT
alarms.description: Motor leads shorted to each other or to 320V return
alarms.quick_fix: Inspect motor cables for damage. Check connections.

alarms.name: AMPLIFIER OVERLOAD
alarms.description: Amplifier detected high load for extended period
alarms.quick_fix: Reduce load. Check for mechanical issues. Sharpen tools.

alarms.name: ATC CAROUSEL MOTOR ELECTRICAL FAULT
alarms.description: Tool carousel motor has electrical fault
alarms.quick_fix: Check relays K9-K12. Test motor power. Check fuses.

alarms.name: ROM PARITY
alarms.description: ROM parity error - memory corruption detected in firmware ROM
alarms.quick_fix: Cycle power. If persists, ROM may need replacement. Contact service.

alarms.name: SRAM PARITY (BYTE 0)
alarms.description: SRAM parity error in byte 0 - parameter/program memory corruption
alarms.quick_fix: Replace battery. Restore parameters from backup. Contact service.

alarms.name: SRAM PARITY (BYTE 1)
alarms.description: SRAM parity error in byte 1 - parameter/program memory corruption
alarms.quick_fix: Replace battery. Restore parameters from backup. Contact service.

alarms.name: DRAM PARITY (BYTE 0)
alarms.description: DRAM parity error in byte 0 - working memory corruption
alarms.quick_fix: Cycle power. Check for overheating. Replace motherboard if persists.

alarms.name: DRAM PARITY (BYTE 1)
alarms.description: DRAM parity error in byte 1 - working memory corruption
alarms.quick_fix: Cycle power. Check for overheating. Replace motherboard if persists.

alarms.name: SERVO ALARM (1-4 AXIS)
alarms.description: System-level servo alarm for axes 1-4, watchdog or RAM parity error
alarms.quick_fix: Check servo amp LEDs. Verify cables. Check axis control card.

alarms.name: SERVO ALARM (5-8 AXIS)
alarms.description: System-level servo alarm for axes 5-8, watchdog or RAM parity error
alarms.quick_fix: Check servo amp LEDs. Verify cables. Check axis control card.

alarms.name: FSSB ALARM
alarms.description: FSSB (FANUC Serial Servo Bus) communication failure
alarms.quick_fix: Check FSSB cables. Replace axis control card if needed.

alarms.name: CPU INTERRUPT
alarms.description: CPU abnormal interrupt - processor malfunction
alarms.quick_fix: Cycle power. Motherboard or CPU card may be faulty.

alarms.name: SRAM ECC ERROR
alarms.description: SRAM ECC (Error Correction Code) error in program storage memory
alarms.quick_fix: Replace SRAM module. Perform all-clear. Reload programs.

alarms.name: PMC SYSTEM ALARM
alarms.description: PMC (Programmable Machine Controller) system error
alarms.quick_fix: Check PMC diagnostics. Motherboard PMC circuit may be faulty.

alarms.name: PMC WATCH DOG ALARM
alarms.description: PMC watchdog timer expired - PMC not executing
alarms.quick_fix: Check ladder program. PMC hardware may need replacement.

alarms.name: NMI OCCURRED IN PMCLSI
alarms.description: Non-maskable interrupt in PMC LSI - I/O RAM parity error
alarms.quick_fix: Replace motherboard PMC section.

alarms.name: NMI OCCURRED IN SLC
alarms.description: Non-maskable interrupt from I/O Link disconnection (PMC-SA1)
alarms.quick_fix: Check I/O Link cables and modules.

alarms.name: NMI OCCURRED IN OTHER MODULE
alarms.description: Non-maskable interrupt from peripheral module
alarms.quick_fix: Check peripheral modules. Remove options to isolate fault.

alarms.name: NON MASK INTERRUPT
alarms.description: General non-maskable interrupt detected
alarms.quick_fix: Cycle power. Hardware fault likely.

alarms.name: F-BUS ERROR
alarms.description: Error on FANUC bus communication
alarms.quick_fix: Check FANUC bus connections. Motherboard may be faulty.

alarms.name: BUS ERROR
alarms.description: General bus error on motherboard
alarms.quick_fix: Motherboard may be faulty. Contact service.

alarms.name: L-BUS ERROR
alarms.description: Error on local bus communication
alarms.quick_fix: Motherboard may be faulty. Contact service.

alarms.name: VDU COMMUNICATION ERROR
alarms.description: Communication error with VDU (Video Display Unit)
alarms.quick_fix: Check display cables. Reseat connectors. Replace VDU if needed.

alarms.name: VDU ERROR
alarms.description: VDU (Video Display Unit) internal error
alarms.quick_fix: Replace VDU unit.

alarms.name: VDU INITIALIZE FAILED
alarms.description: VDU failed to initialize during power-on
alarms.quick_fix: Cycle power. Replace VDU if persists.

alarms.name: SIO LINK ERROR
alarms.description: Serial I/O link communication error
alarms.quick_fix: Check serial cables. Verify baud rates. Shield from noise.

alarms.name: PSC OPTICAL SCALE ENCODER ERROR
alarms.description: PSC optical scale encoder error detected
alarms.quick_fix: Clean scale. Check encoder cables. Replace if damaged.

alarms.name: MF-SAFETY ERROR
alarms.description: Machine function safety system error
alarms.quick_fix: Check safety circuits. Do not bypass. Contact service.

alarms.name: SAFETY I/O ERROR
alarms.description: Safety I/O link communication error
alarms.quick_fix: Check safety I/O devices. Look for shorted components.

alarms.name: SAFETY SERVO LINK ERROR
alarms.description: Safety servo link communication error
alarms.quick_fix: Check servo link cables. Verify MCS settings.

alarms.name: MAGNETIC ENCODER SPEED DETECTION ERROR
alarms.description: Magnetic encoder cannot detect speed properly
alarms.quick_fix: Check encoder. Reduce speed during diagnostics.

alarms.name: MCS ROTARY ENCODER 5 INIT FAILURE
alarms.description: MCS rotary encoder 5 failed initialization
alarms.quick_fix: Check encoder 5 cable. Verify MCS configuration.

alarms.name: MCS ROTARY ENCODER 5 ERROR
alarms.description: MCS rotary encoder 5 runtime error
alarms.quick_fix: Check encoder. Clean and reseat connections.

alarms.name: SPEED CHANGE RATIO FAILURE
alarms.description: Speed change ratio for axis is incorrectly set or out of range
alarms.quick_fix: Check speed change ratio parameters. Verify encoder type.

alarms.name: MCS COMMUNICATION ERROR
alarms.description: Communication error with MCS (Machine Control System) during power-up
alarms.quick_fix: Check MCS LED indicators (22=normal). Verify ID settings.

alarms.name: I/O MAPPING ERROR
alarms.description: I/O mapping error - often after option installation
alarms.quick_fix: Install I/O mapping software DVD. Re-configure options.

alarms.name: HARDWARE PLUG-IN MODULE FOR DIGITIZER MISSING
alarms.description: Hardware plug-in module for communication with digitizer is missing
alarms.quick_fix: Install or reseat digitizer communication module

alarms.name: ORIENTABLE TOOLHOLDER FINE CORRECTION TOO LARGE
alarms.description: Amount of fine correction in parameter of orientable toolholder is too large
alarms.quick_fix: Reduce fine correction parameter value

alarms.name: ORIENTABLE TOOLHOLDER DOES NOT EXIST
alarms.description: Orientable toolholder number for orientation transformation does not exist
alarms.quick_fix: Configure orientable toolholder or correct program

alarms.name: INVALID TRANSFORMATION TYPE IN TOOLHOLDER
alarms.description: Invalid transformation type specified in toolholder for orientation transformer
alarms.quick_fix: Correct transformation type in toolholder configuration

alarms.name: INVALID TRANSFORMATION TYPE IN BLOCK
alarms.description: Invalid transformation type specified in transformation number within block
alarms.quick_fix: Correct transformation command in program

alarms.name: NO DATA SET AVAILABLE FOR TRANSFORMATION
alarms.description: No data set available for the specified transformation number
alarms.quick_fix: Configure transformation data set

alarms.name: INVALID MACHINE DATA FOR 5-AXIS TRANSFORMATION
alarms.description: Invalid machine data for general 5-axis transformation
alarms.quick_fix: Review and correct 5-axis machine data configuration

alarms.name: AXCONF_MACHAX_NAME_TAB CONFLICT
alarms.description: Machine data 10000 axis configuration name table conflict detected
alarms.quick_fix: Correct MD10000 AXCONF_MACHAX_NAME_TAB configuration

alarms.name: AXCONF_CHANAX_NAME_TAB CONFLICT
alarms.description: Machine data 20080 channel axis name table conflict detected
alarms.quick_fix: Correct MD20080 AXCONF_CHANAX_NAME_TAB configuration

alarms.name: DRIVE SYSTEM ERROR F034
alarms.description: Internal drive system error - software/hardware fault
alarms.quick_fix: Power cycle, if persistent replace control module

alarms.name: DRIVE SYSTEM ERROR F035
alarms.description: Internal drive system error - replaced V1.x EPROM error
alarms.quick_fix: Replace control module or upgrade firmware

alarms.name: SPINDLE SAFETY SPEED OPERATION ERROR
alarms.description: Trouble occurred for spindle in safety-speed operation mode
alarms.quick_fix: Contact Mazak Technical Center with alarm details

alarms.name: SERVO POWER-OFF LEVEL ABNORMAL
alarms.description: The servo (power-off level) is abnormal
alarms.quick_fix: Replace servo amplifier

alarms.name: SERVO PARAMETER TRANSFER ERROR
alarms.description: Parameters transferred from NC to servo amplifier during power-on are incorrect
alarms.quick_fix: Re-set servo parameters through service menu

alarms.name: SERVO NC RESET LEVEL ABNORMAL
alarms.description: The servo (NC reset level) is abnormal
alarms.quick_fix: Contact Mazak Technical Center

alarms.name: SERVO AMPLIFIER POWER-OFF LEVEL ABNORMAL
alarms.description: The servo (amplifier power-off level) is abnormal
alarms.quick_fix: Replace servo amplifier

alarms.name: SPINDLE POWER-OFF LEVEL ABNORMAL
alarms.description: The spindle (power-off level) is abnormal
alarms.quick_fix: Contact Mazak Technical Center

alarms.name: SPINDLE PARAMETER TRANSFER ERROR
alarms.description: Parameters transferred from NC to spindle amplifier during power-on are incorrect
alarms.quick_fix: Re-configure spindle parameters

alarms.name: SPINDLE NC RESET LEVEL ABNORMAL
alarms.description: The spindle (NC reset level) is abnormal
alarms.quick_fix: Contact Mazak Technical Center

alarms.name: SPINDLE AMPLIFIER POWER-OFF LEVEL ABNORMAL
alarms.description: The spindle (amplifier power-off level) is abnormal
alarms.quick_fix: Replace spindle amplifier

alarms.name: MR-JT-C2 E2ROM WRITE ERROR
alarms.description: Error during communication with MR-JT-C2, parameters cannot be written to E2ROM
alarms.quick_fix: Replace MR-JT-C2 amplifier

alarms.name: NC BATTERY LOW VOLTAGE
alarms.description: Battery for retaining parameters and programs has reached minimum voltage or run down
alarms.quick_fix: Recharge or replace NC backup battery, verify data integrity

alarms.name: SOFTWARE LIMIT EXCEEDED - PLUS DIRECTION
alarms.description: Tool tip overstepped software limit in plus direction during automatic operation
alarms.quick_fix: Correct program or adjust software limit parameters

alarms.name: SOFTWARE LIMIT EXCEEDED - MINUS DIRECTION
alarms.description: Tool tip overstepped software limit in minus direction during automatic operation
alarms.quick_fix: Correct program or adjust software limit parameters

alarms.name: SERVO-OFF FUNCTION ACTIVE
alarms.description: Servo-off function is activated preventing axis movement
alarms.quick_fix: Deactivate servo-off function

alarms.name: MODE SELECTION ERROR
alarms.description: Incorrect mode selection or mode selector switch malfunction
alarms.quick_fix: Contact Mazak Technical Center

alarms.name: CUTTING FEED OVERRIDE AT ZERO
alarms.description: Cutting-feed override value is set to 0 on machine operating panel
alarms.quick_fix: Set cutting-feed override to value greater than 0

alarms.name: MANUAL FEEDRATE AT ZERO
alarms.description: Manual feedrate set to 0 during cutting feed or dry-run in automatic mode
alarms.quick_fix: Set manual feedrate to value greater than 0

alarms.name: SPINDLE DID NOT START
alarms.description: Spindle rotation did not start when command issued during automatic operation
alarms.quick_fix: Check spindle amplifier and encoder operation

alarms.name: SPINDLE SPEED LIMIT EXCEEDED
alarms.description: The spindle-speed limit has been exceeded
alarms.quick_fix: Reduce spindle speed, check amplifier operation

alarms.name: BLOCK START INTERLOCK
alarms.description: Interlock signal to lock start of program block has been input
alarms.quick_fix: Check sequence program for normal functioning

alarms.name: CUTTING BLOCK START INTERLOCK
alarms.description: Interlock signal to lock start of cutting program block has been input
alarms.quick_fix: Check sequence program for normal functioning

alarms.name: DYNAMIC COMPENSATION EXCEEDED
alarms.description: Dynamic compensation amount exceeded 3 mm (0.12 in.)
alarms.quick_fix: Check dynamic compensation parameters and sensor

alarms.name: TOOL ENTERED CHUCK BARRIER
alarms.description: Tool entered the chuck barrier zone
alarms.quick_fix: Modify barrier parameters or correct program

alarms.name: TOOL ENTERED TAIL BARRIER
alarms.description: Tool entered the tailstock barrier zone
alarms.quick_fix: Correct machining program or review tool and barrier data

alarms.name: WORKPIECE INTERFERENCE - DUAL SPINDLE
alarms.description: Interference between No. 1 and No. 2 turning spindle workpieces
alarms.quick_fix: Correct machining program or review barrier parameters

alarms.name: TANDEM DRIVING OPTION NOT PRESENT
alarms.description: Attempted tandem driving without tandem driving option
alarms.quick_fix: Enable tandem driving option or modify program

alarms.name: INVALID INPUT DATA FORMAT
alarms.description: Format of input data is not available
alarms.quick_fix: Enter data in correct format

alarms.name: PROGRAM LAYOUT DATA LIMIT EXCEEDED
alarms.description: 1000 sets of program layout data already stored - cannot add more
alarms.quick_fix: Delete unnecessary programs or save to external storage

alarms.name: PROGRAM NUMBER NOT FOUND
alarms.description: Attempted to select program with unregistered work number
alarms.quick_fix: Select program with registered work number

alarms.name: PROGRAM LOCK ENABLED
alarms.description: PROGRAM LOCK/ENABLE switch is set to LOCK position
alarms.quick_fix: Set PROGRAM LOCK/ENABLE switch to ENABLE

alarms.name: TOOL NAME ORDER WITH TOOL IN SPINDLE
alarms.description: Attempted TOOL NAME ORDER operation while tool remains in spindle
alarms.quick_fix: Remove tool from spindle, then retry operation

alarms.name: STRING NOT FOUND IN PROGRAM
alarms.description: Designated number or character string does not exist in program
alarms.quick_fix: Designate existing number or character string

alarms.name: PROGRAM MEMORY DATA DESTROYED
alarms.description: Memory contents in machining-program data storage area have been destroyed
alarms.quick_fix: Delete corrupted program and reload

alarms.name: PROGRAM INSERTION NOT POSSIBLE
alarms.description: Cannot insert data before common program unit
alarms.quick_fix: Move cursor to valid insertion position

alarms.name: PROGRAM DELETION NOT POSSIBLE
alarms.description: Cannot delete common unit or % during MAZATROL program editing
alarms.quick_fix: Cannot delete common unit - edit other parts of program

alarms.name: PROGRAM DATA CORRUPTED - POWER LOSS
alarms.description: Program may be corrupted due to power loss during editing
alarms.quick_fix: Check program for incorrect data and correct errors

alarms.name: 3D REMODELING FAILED
alarms.description: 3D remodeling of workpiece, fixture, or tool has failed
alarms.quick_fix: Modify entered data or confirm model validity

alarms.name: LONG BORING BAR ASSIGNMENT ERROR
alarms.description: Long boring bar assigned to section not defined as special pocket
alarms.quick_fix: Assign long boring bar to designated special pocket

alarms.name: TOOL SETUP AUTO-SETTING NOT SUPPORTED
alarms.description: Tool setup auto-setting attempted on unsupported tool type
alarms.quick_fix: Use auto-setting only for No. 2 turning spindle turret tools

alarms.name: PROGRAM MISMATCH DURING WORKPIECE TRANSFER
alarms.description: Machine-operating program differs from selected program during workpiece transfer
alarms.quick_fix: Match machine-operating and selected programs

alarms.name: TOOL MODEL NOT SELECTED
alarms.description: Tool model to be copied/erased/renamed is not selected
alarms.quick_fix: Select appropriate tool model before operation

alarms.name: TOOL MODEL NAME ALREADY REGISTERED
alarms.description: Specified tool model name is already registered
alarms.quick_fix: Specify unregistered name for new tool model

alarms.name: SPINDLE?
alarms.description: Spindle command missing or spindle not defined
alarms.quick_fix: Add spindle command or verify spindle configuration
alarms.source: HEIDENHAIN TNC 640 NC Error Messages Manual

alarms.name: TOOL AXIS IS MISSING
alarms.description: Tool axis not programmed or incorrectly defined
alarms.quick_fix: Add tool axis command or correct program
alarms.source: HEIDENHAIN TNC 640 NC Error Messages Manual

alarms.name: TOOL RADIUS TOO SMALL
alarms.description: Programmed tool radius is smaller than minimum allowed
alarms.quick_fix: Check tool radius in tool table
alarms.source: HEIDENHAIN TNC 640 NC Error Messages Manual

alarms.name: TOOL RADIUS TOO LARGE
alarms.description: Programmed tool radius exceeds maximum allowed
alarms.quick_fix: Select smaller tool or modify contour
alarms.source: HEIDENHAIN TNC 640 NC Error Messages Manual

alarms.name: RANGE EXCEEDED
alarms.description: Programmed position exceeds machine travel range
alarms.quick_fix: Correct programmed position or work offset
alarms.source: HEIDENHAIN TNC 640 NC Error Messages Manual

alarms.name: START POSITION INCORRECT
alarms.description: Invalid start position for cycle or contour
alarms.quick_fix: Correct start position in program
alarms.source: HEIDENHAIN TNC 640 NC Error Messages Manual

alarms.name: ROTATION NOT PERMITTED
alarms.description: Rotation command not allowed in current context
alarms.quick_fix: Remove or relocate ROTATION command
alarms.source: HEIDENHAIN TNC 640 NC Error Messages Manual

alarms.name: SCALING FACTOR NOT PERMITTED
alarms.description: Scaling factor command not allowed in current context
alarms.quick_fix: Remove or adjust SCALING FACTOR command
alarms.source: HEIDENHAIN TNC 640 NC Error Messages Manual

alarms.name: MIRROR IMAGE NOT PERMITTED
alarms.description: Mirror image command not allowed in current context
alarms.quick_fix: Remove or relocate MIRROR IMAGE command
alarms.source: HEIDENHAIN TNC 640 NC Error Messages Manual

alarms.name: DATUM SHIFT NOT PERMITTED
alarms.description: Datum shift command not allowed in current context
alarms.quick_fix: Remove or relocate datum shift command
alarms.source: HEIDENHAIN TNC 640 NC Error Messages Manual

alarms.name: FEED RATE IS MISSING
alarms.description: Feed rate not programmed for movement command
alarms.quick_fix: Add feed rate command (F)
alarms.source: HEIDENHAIN TNC 640 NC Error Messages Manual

alarms.name: INPUT VALUE INCORRECT
alarms.description: Entered value is outside allowed range or format
alarms.quick_fix: Correct input value
alarms.source: HEIDENHAIN TNC 640 NC Error Messages Manual

alarms.name: INCORRECT SIGN
alarms.description: Sign of programmed value is incorrect for context
alarms.quick_fix: Correct sign in program
alarms.source: HEIDENHAIN TNC 640 NC Error Messages Manual

alarms.name: ENTERED ANGLE NOT PERMITTED
alarms.description: Programmed angle value not allowed
alarms.quick_fix: Correct angle value in program
alarms.source: HEIDENHAIN TNC 640 NC Error Messages Manual

alarms.name: TOUCH POINT INACCESSIBLE
alarms.description: Probing cycle cannot reach designated touch point
alarms.quick_fix: Adjust probing position or approach
alarms.source: HEIDENHAIN TNC 640 NC Error Messages Manual

alarms.name: TOO MANY POINTS
alarms.description: Number of programmed points exceeds maximum allowed
alarms.quick_fix: Reduce number of contour points
alarms.source: HEIDENHAIN TNC 640 NC Error Messages Manual

alarms.name: CONTRADICTORY INPUT
alarms.description: Programmed values are mathematically contradictory
alarms.quick_fix: Review and correct contradictory values
alarms.source: HEIDENHAIN TNC 640 NC Error Messages Manual

alarms.name: CYCL INCOMPLETE
alarms.description: Fixed cycle definition is incomplete or missing parameters
alarms.quick_fix: Complete cycle definition with required parameters
alarms.source: HEIDENHAIN TNC 640 NC Error Messages Manual

alarms.name: PLANE WRONGLY DEFINED
alarms.description: Working plane definition is incorrect
alarms.quick_fix: Correct plane definition
alarms.source: HEIDENHAIN TNC 640 NC Error Messages Manual

alarms.name: WRONG AXIS PROGRAMMED
alarms.description: Programmed axis is invalid for current operation
alarms.quick_fix: Select correct axis for operation
alarms.source: HEIDENHAIN TNC 640 NC Error Messages Manual

alarms.name: WRONG RPM
alarms.description: Spindle RPM value is incorrect for operation
alarms.quick_fix: Correct spindle speed command
alarms.source: HEIDENHAIN TNC 640 NC Error Messages Manual

alarms.name: RADIUS COMP. UNDEFINED
alarms.description: Tool radius compensation not defined before use
alarms.quick_fix: Add radius compensation command before contour
alarms.source: HEIDENHAIN TNC 640 NC Error Messages Manual

alarms.name: ROUNDING-OFF UNDEFINED
alarms.description: Rounding radius not defined for corner
alarms.quick_fix: Add rounding parameter
alarms.source: HEIDENHAIN TNC 640 NC Error Messages Manual

alarms.name: TNC OPERATING TEMPERATURE EXCEEDED
alarms.description: Control operating temperature has exceeded safe limits
alarms.quick_fix: Check heat transfer in electrical cabinet, check fan on logic unit
alarms.source: HEIDENHAIN TNC 640 NC Error Messages Manual

alarms.name: ZIP FILE CREATE ERROR
alarms.description: TNC was not able to create or close zip file - file may be corrupt
alarms.quick_fix: Try again to create zip file, check disk space
alarms.source: HEIDENHAIN TNC 640 NC Error Messages Manual

alarms.name: NO RESPONSE FROM DRIVE
alarms.description: No response received from drive system
alarms.quick_fix: Check drive power and communication cables
alarms.source: HEIDENHAIN TNC 640 NC Error Messages Manual

alarms.name: NETWORK DRIVE NOT READY
alarms.description: Network drive is no longer ready or no longer reacts
alarms.quick_fix: Check network connection and server status
alarms.source: HEIDENHAIN TNC 640 NC Error Messages Manual

alarms.name: CONFIGURATION FILE WRITE ERROR
alarms.description: Configuration file cannot be written
alarms.quick_fix: Check file permissions and disk space
alarms.source: HEIDENHAIN TNC 640 NC Error Messages Manual

alarms.name: CONFIGURATION FILE NOT FOUND
alarms.description: Required configuration file cannot be found
alarms.quick_fix: Restore configuration file, inform service agency
alarms.source: HEIDENHAIN TNC 640 NC Error Messages Manual

alarms.name: EPROM CRC ERROR
alarms.description: CRC sum of EPROMs is incorrect - memory corruption
alarms.quick_fix: Contact service agency - EPROM replacement required
alarms.source: HEIDENHAIN TNC 640 NC Error Messages Manual

alarms.name: NOMINAL SPEED VALUE TOO HIGH
alarms.description: Calculated nominal speed value is excessively high
alarms.quick_fix: Check speed parameters and program
alarms.source: HEIDENHAIN TNC 640 NC Error Messages Manual

alarms.name: KEY STUCK DETECTION
alarms.description: One or more keys were pressed for more than 5 seconds
alarms.quick_fix: Press SHIFT, CTRL, ALT keys; if problem continues, inform service
alarms.source: HEIDENHAIN TNC 640 NC Error Messages Manual

alarms.name: INTERLOCK SIGNAL ACTIVE
alarms.description: Interlock signal has been input to lock block start
alarms.quick_fix: Check interlock signal line for broken wires

alarms.name: CUTTING INTERLOCK ACTIVE
alarms.description: Interlock signal to lock cutting block start has been input
alarms.quick_fix: Check cutting interlock signal status

alarms.name: INTERNAL INTERLOCK AXIS EXISTS
alarms.description: Internal interlock state has been entered
alarms.quick_fix: Release servo OFF function, check encoder connection

alarms.name: STROKE END ACTIVE
alarms.description: Stroke end function has activated - axis in stroke end status
alarms.quick_fix: Move axis away from limit using JOG mode

alarms.name: INSUFFICIENT VOLTAGE
alarms.description: Drop of bus voltage was detected in main circuit
alarms.quick_fix: Check power supply voltage and connections

alarms.name: SUB SIDE ENCODER ERROR 5
alarms.description: Error detected by encoder connected to machine side
alarms.quick_fix: Check encoder connection and type configuration

alarms.name: FEEDBACK ERROR 3
alarms.description: Missed feedback pulse or Z-phase error in full closed loop
alarms.quick_fix: Check encoder/scale, verify cable shielding

alarms.name: SAFELY LIMITED SPEED MONITORING ERROR
alarms.description: Commanded speed exceeding safely limited speed detected
alarms.quick_fix: Reduce commanded speed to within safety limits

alarms.name: DUAL SIGNAL ERROR
alarms.description: Error detected in signal related to dual signal safety function
alarms.quick_fix: Check safety function signals and connections

alarms.name: POWER SUPPLY OVERCURRENT
alarms.description: Overcurrent protection function in power module has activated
alarms.quick_fix: Check motor and cable for short circuit

alarms.name: POWER SUPPLY FREQUENCY ERROR
alarms.description: Input power supply frequency exceeded specification range
alarms.quick_fix: Check input power supply frequency

alarms.name: POWER SUPPLY PROCESS ERROR
alarms.description: Error occurred in power supply process cycle
alarms.quick_fix: Check power module operation, may require replacement

alarms.name: INITIAL PARAMETER ERROR - SERVO
alarms.description: Servo parameter setting data is illegal at startup
alarms.quick_fix: Verify and correct servo parameters

alarms.name: SPINDLE STOPPED DURING THREADING
alarms.description: Spindle stopped during synchronous feed or thread cutting
alarms.quick_fix: Check spindle drive and restart program

alarms.name: HANDLE FEED AXIS OUT OF SPEC
alarms.description: Axis designated at handle feed is out of specifications
alarms.quick_fix: Select single valid axis for handle feed

alarms.name: SPINDLE SPEED EXCEEDED AXIS CLAMP
alarms.description: Spindle rotation speed exceeded axis clamp speed during threading
causes: Speed too high for thread pitch
alarms.quick_fix: Reduce spindle speed or adjust clamp parameter

alarms.name: COLLATION STOP
alarms.description: Collation stop occurred during block comparison
alarms.quick_fix: Execute automatic start to resume operation

alarms.name: TAPPING SPINDLE SELECT ERROR
alarms.description: Synchronous tapping command with spindle select signals all OFF
alarms.quick_fix: Turn ON spindle select signal (SWS) for tapping spindle

alarms.name: TAPPING PITCH/THREAD ERROR
alarms.description: Pitch or thread number command incorrect in synchronous tapping
causes: Thread number too large for speed
alarms.quick_fix: Correct pitch value or reduce spindle speed

alarms.name: TAP RETRACT INTERLOCK
alarms.description: Axis travel command interlocked while tap retract is enabled
alarms.quick_fix: Perform tap retract before issuing travel command

alarms.name: REGISTER DIAGNOSIS ERROR
alarms.description: Register diagnosis error detected in safety function
alarms.quick_fix: Contact service - safety system inspection required

alarms.name: ENCODER THERMAL ERROR
alarms.description: Encoder thermal error detected (OSA405/TS5690)
alarms.quick_fix: Check encoder cooling and ambient temperature

alarms.name: ENCODER MEMORY ERROR
alarms.description: Encoder internal memory error detected
alarms.quick_fix: Replace encoder

alarms.name: ENCODER OVERSPEED
alarms.description: Encoder overspeed condition detected
alarms.quick_fix: Reduce speed, check for mechanical issues

alarms.name: EMERGENCY STOP OR OVERTRAVEL DETECTED
alarms.description: Emergency button pressed or overtravel of axes detected
alarms.quick_fix: Release emergency button and reset limit switch for overtravel check

alarms.name: HYD PUMP MOTOR OVERLOAD
alarms.description: Hydraulic pump motor overload detected
alarms.quick_fix: Check overload value on thermal relay and motor

alarms.name: REVOLVING SPINDLE EMERGENCY STOP
alarms.description: Emergency stop activated on revolving spindle
alarms.quick_fix: Check spindle safety system

alarms.name: INVERTER FAULT ALARM
alarms.description: Fault detected in inverter drive system
alarms.quick_fix: Check inverter status and parameters

alarms.name: KEEP RELAY SETTING ALARM
alarms.description: Keep relay K5 setting error
alarms.quick_fix: Check keep relay K5 configuration

alarms.name: PSM POWER RUNNING ALARM
alarms.description: Power supply module running alarm
alarms.quick_fix: Check auxiliary contact on magnetic contactor KM10/KM110

alarms.name: MILLING SPINDLE ORIENTATION OVERTIME
alarms.description: Milling spindle orientation exceeded time limit
alarms.quick_fix: Check spindle encoder and orientation parameters

alarms.name: COOLANT/LUB PUMP MOTOR OVERLOAD
alarms.description: Coolant, lubrication pump motor overload or Q11 for servo turret
alarms.quick_fix: Check coolant/lub pump motor and filters

alarms.name: TORQUE SKIP DATA ERROR
alarms.description: Error in torque skip data configuration
alarms.quick_fix: Verify torque skip parameters

alarms.name: SPINDLE ORIENTATION CONFIRM NOT DETECTED
alarms.description: Spindle orientation confirmation not detected within 10 seconds
alarms.quick_fix: Check orientation parameter and readjust

alarms.name: ORIENTATION INDEX COMMAND ALARM
alarms.description: Error in spindle orientation index command
alarms.quick_fix: Check orientation index command and parameters

alarms.name: TOOL INDEX OVERTIME
alarms.description: Tool indexing operation exceeded time limit
alarms.quick_fix: Check ATC mechanism and sensors

alarms.name: TOOL NUMBER COMMAND ALARM
alarms.description: Invalid tool number commanded
alarms.quick_fix: Verify tool number is valid for machine configuration

alarms.name: SPINDLE SPEED ARRIVAL NOT DETECTED
alarms.description: Spindle speed arrival not detected within 7 seconds
alarms.quick_fix: Check spindle servo unit

alarms.name: SPINDLE ROTATION CONDITION NOT READY
alarms.description: Spindle rotation prerequisites not satisfied
alarms.quick_fix: Check spindle rotation conditions

alarms.name: SPLASH GUARD DOOR OPEN
alarms.description: Splash guard door detected as open
alarms.quick_fix: Close splash guard door, check limit switches

alarms.name: M17/M18 COMMAND IN ILLEGAL MODE
alarms.description: M17 or M18 commanded in invalid mode
alarms.quick_fix: Confirm MDI mode before M17/M18 command

alarms.name: SPINDLE MAXIMUM RPM SETTING ERROR
alarms.description: Error in maximum spindle RPM setting
alarms.quick_fix: Verify spindle maximum RPM parameter

alarms.name: ILLEGAL CONDITION IN SPINDLE ROTATION
alarms.description: Spindle rotation commanded in illegal condition
alarms.quick_fix: Check spindle rotation prerequisites

alarms.name: GEAR SHIFT OVERTIME ALARM
alarms.description: Spindle gear shift operation exceeded time limit
alarms.quick_fix: Check gear shift mechanism and hydraulics

alarms.name: SPINDLE TOOL CLAMP/UNCLAMP CHANGE ALARM
alarms.description: Error in spindle tool clamp or unclamp operation
alarms.quick_fix: Check tool clamp mechanism and air pressure

alarms.name: DRY RUN STATUS
alarms.description: Machine is in dry run status
alarms.quick_fix: Press CYCLE START to reset this alarm

alarms.name: COOLANT FILTER CHANGE ALARM
alarms.description: Coolant filter requires replacement
alarms.quick_fix: Replace coolant filter

alarms.name: SPINDLE COMMAND ABNORMAL
alarms.description: Spindle command must be changed after spindle stop
alarms.quick_fix: Issue spindle stop (M05/M35/M65) before changing command

alarms.name: CANCEL RIGID TAPPING MODE TO SWITCH SPINDLE
alarms.description: Must cancel rigid tapping mode before switching spindle
causes: Rigid tapping active during spindle switch attempt
alarms.quick_fix: Cancel rigid tapping mode before switching spindle

alarms.name: B-AXIS NOT CLAMPED
alarms.description: B-axis is not clamped for operation
alarms.quick_fix: Ensure B-axis is clamped using M106, M110 or M112

alarms.name: PROGRAM RESTART TOGGLE SWITCH ON STATE
alarms.description: Program restart toggle switch is in ON state
alarms.quick_fix: Toggle program restart switch off if not needed

alarms.name: SERVO TURRET BATTERY LOW
alarms.description: Servo turret amplifier battery is low
alarms.quick_fix: Replace battery in amplifier module within 2 weeks

alarms.name: RIGID TAPPING/ORIENTATION INVALID ON G96
alarms.description: M19, M119, or M29 is invalid during G96 (CSS) mode
alarms.quick_fix: Modify program to remove rigid tapping during G96 mode

alarms.name: SPINDLE OVERRIDE OR FEEDRATE 0%
alarms.description: Spindle override or feedrate is set to 0%
alarms.quick_fix: Increase spindle override or feedrate above 0%

alarms.name: MACHINE LOCK ON STATUS
alarms.description: Machine lock function is active
alarms.quick_fix: Disable machine lock to allow operation

alarms.name: M00 OR M01 COMMAND
alarms.description: Program stop (M00) or optional stop (M01) executed
alarms.quick_fix: Press CYCLE START to continue

alarms.name: M02 OR M30 COMMAND
alarms.description: Program end (M02) or end and rewind (M30) executed
alarms.quick_fix: Restart program if needed

alarms.name: SERVICE MODE ACTIVE
alarms.description: Machine is in service mode - door open operation allowed
alarms.quick_fix: Note: Spindle will not start unless door closed

alarms.name: SPINDLE TOOL UNCLAMP ALARM
alarms.description: Error in spindle tool unclamp operation
alarms.quick_fix: Check tool unclamp mechanism and air pressure

alarms.name: MAIN POWER PHASE ERROR
alarms.description: Main power phase sequence or loss detected
alarms.quick_fix: Check main power supply phases

alarms.name: NC SYSTEM ERROR
alarms.description: NC system internal error detected
alarms.quick_fix: Power cycle machine, contact service if persistent

alarms.name: SERVO COMMUNICATION ERROR
alarms.description: Communication error between NC and servo amplifier
alarms.quick_fix: Check servo communication cables and connections

alarms.name: SPINDLE AMPLIFIER ERROR
alarms.description: Error detected in spindle amplifier
alarms.quick_fix: Check spindle amplifier LEDs and parameters

alarms.name: ATC ARM POSITION ERROR
alarms.description: Tool changer arm not in correct position
alarms.quick_fix: Check ATC arm mechanism and sensors

alarms.name: MAGAZINE INDEX ERROR
alarms.description: Tool magazine indexing error
alarms.quick_fix: Check magazine indexing mechanism

alarms.name: AXIS OVERLOAD
alarms.description: Servo axis overload condition detected
alarms.quick_fix: Check for mechanical interference, reduce load

alarms.name: ENCODER COMMUNICATION ERROR
alarms.description: Error in encoder communication
alarms.quick_fix: Check encoder cables and connections

alarms.name: HYDRAULIC PRESSURE LOW
alarms.description: Hydraulic system pressure below minimum
alarms.quick_fix: Check hydraulic system pressure and oil level

alarms.name: COOLANT LEVEL LOW
alarms.description: Coolant tank level below minimum
alarms.quick_fix: Add coolant to tank

alarms.name: DOOR OPEN DURING OPERATION
alarms.description: Safety door opened during automatic operation
alarms.quick_fix: Close door, restart operation

alarms.name: CELOS SYSTEM ERROR
alarms.description: CELOS operating system error detected
alarms.quick_fix: Restart CELOS system, power cycle if needed

alarms.name: LINEAR SCALE ERROR
alarms.description: Linear scale reading error on axis
alarms.quick_fix: Clean linear scale, check reader head

alarms.name: B-AXIS TORQUE MOTOR OVERTEMP
alarms.description: B-axis direct drive torque motor overtemperature
alarms.quick_fix: Allow motor to cool, check cooling system

alarms.name: TOOL MAGAZINE FULL
alarms.description: Tool magazine has no empty positions
alarms.quick_fix: Remove unused tools from magazine

alarms.name: HSK TOOL CLAMP PRESSURE LOW
alarms.description: HSK tool holder clamping pressure insufficient
alarms.quick_fix: Check hydraulic pressure and clamping mechanism

alarms.name: CHIP CONVEYOR JAM
alarms.description: Chip conveyor motor overload or jam detected
alarms.quick_fix: Clear chip jam, check conveyor mechanism

alarms.name: THROUGH-SPINDLE COOLANT LOW
alarms.description: Through-spindle coolant pressure or level low
alarms.quick_fix: Check coolant level and pump operation

alarms.name: ADDRESS PROGRAMMED REPEATEDLY
alarms.description: Same address has been programmed multiple times in one block
alarms.quick_fix: Remove duplicate address from block, check program syntax
alarms.source: SIEMENS SINUMERIK 840D sl Diagnostics Manual V4.7

alarms.name: ADDRESS TYPE PROGRAMMED TOO OFTEN
alarms.description: Address type appears more times than allowed in block
causes: Multiple axis addresses of same type
alarms.quick_fix: Reduce address repetitions, verify block structure
alarms.source: SIEMENS SINUMERIK 840D sl Diagnostics Manual V4.7

alarms.name: ILLEGAL ADDRESS MODIFICATION
alarms.description: Address contains illegal modification or extension
alarms.quick_fix: Correct address syntax, remove invalid modifiers
alarms.source: SIEMENS SINUMERIK 840D sl Diagnostics Manual V4.7

alarms.name: INVALID PARAMETER OR DATA TYPE
alarms.description: Parameter or data type is invalid for this command
alarms.quick_fix: Check parameter types in programming manual, correct syntax
alarms.source: SIEMENS SINUMERIK 840D sl Diagnostics Manual V4.7

alarms.name: EXPRESSION NOT OF DATA TYPE AXIS
alarms.description: Expression does not resolve to AXIS data type as required
alarms.quick_fix: Use correct axis identifier or variable type
alarms.source: SIEMENS SINUMERIK 840D sl Diagnostics Manual V4.7

alarms.name: DIN ADDRESS NOT CONFIGURED
alarms.description: DIN address used in program is not configured in machine data
alarms.quick_fix: Configure DIN address in machine data MD 10712 or use standard address
alarms.source: SIEMENS SINUMERIK 840D sl Diagnostics Manual V4.7

alarms.name: SAME G GROUP PROGRAMMED REPEATEDLY
alarms.description: Multiple G codes from the same G group in one block
causes: G17 and G18 in same block
alarms.quick_fix: Remove duplicate G group codes, keep only one per group
alarms.source: SIEMENS SINUMERIK 840D sl Diagnostics Manual V4.7

alarms.name: TOO MANY SYNTAX-DEFINING G FUNCTIONS
alarms.description: Block contains more syntax-defining G codes than allowed
causes: Too many G codes requiring different syntax
alarms.quick_fix: Split block into multiple blocks with fewer G codes each
alarms.source: SIEMENS SINUMERIK 840D sl Diagnostics Manual V4.7

alarms.name: FRAME PARAMETERS REPEATED
alarms.description: Frame parameters defined multiple times
alarms.quick_fix: Use single frame definition per block
alarms.source: SIEMENS SINUMERIK 840D sl Diagnostics Manual V4.7

alarms.name: SYNTAX ERROR IN TEXT
alarms.description: Text contains syntax error or invalid characters
alarms.quick_fix: Check text syntax, ensure proper quotes around strings
alarms.source: SIEMENS SINUMERIK 840D sl Diagnostics Manual V4.7

alarms.name: SINGLE CHARACTER ACCESS WITH CALL-BY-REFERENCE NOT ALLOWED
alarms.description: Cannot access single character with call-by-reference parameter
alarms.quick_fix: Use different method for character access
alarms.source: SIEMENS SINUMERIK 840D sl Diagnostics Manual V4.7

alarms.name: VARIABLE SINGLE CHARACTER ACCESS NOT ALLOWED
alarms.description: Cannot access this variable as single character
causes: Variable type does not support character access
alarms.quick_fix: Convert variable to string before character access
alarms.source: SIEMENS SINUMERIK 840D sl Diagnostics Manual V4.7

alarms.name: SKIP ID/LABEL IN CONTROL STRUCTURE NOT ALLOWED
alarms.description: GOTO or label jump not permitted within control structure
alarms.quick_fix: Restructure program logic without jumping into control structures
alarms.source: SIEMENS SINUMERIK 840D sl Diagnostics Manual V4.7

alarms.name: INVALID NESTING OF CONTROL STRUCTURES
alarms.description: Control structures (IF/WHILE/FOR) improperly nested
alarms.quick_fix: Verify all control structures are properly closed and nested
alarms.source: SIEMENS SINUMERIK 840D sl Diagnostics Manual V4.7

alarms.name: MAXIMUM NESTING DEPTH EXCEEDED
alarms.description: Control structure nesting exceeds maximum allowed depth
alarms.quick_fix: Simplify program structure, reduce nesting levels
alarms.source: SIEMENS SINUMERIK 840D sl Diagnostics Manual V4.7

alarms.name: POWER SUPPLY ERROR
alarms.description: Error detected in drive power supply section
alarms.quick_fix: Check power supply connections and voltage, replace power module if needed

alarms.name: MAINS VOLTAGE TOO HIGH
alarms.description: Input mains voltage exceeds permissible limit
alarms.quick_fix: Verify supply voltage is within spec, check transformer taps

alarms.name: MOTOR OVERTEMPERATURE
alarms.description: Motor temperature exceeded fault threshold p0605
alarms.quick_fix: Allow motor to cool, check ventilation, verify load parameters

alarms.name: CURRENT MEASUREMENT ERROR
alarms.description: Error in actual current measurement circuit
alarms.quick_fix: Check motor cables and connections, replace power module

alarms.name: MOTOR SHAFT MOVEMENT UNEXPECTED
alarms.description: Motor shaft movement detected when not expected
alarms.quick_fix: Check encoder connections, verify motor is mechanically free

alarms.name: MOTOR SHAFT ANGLE DIFFERENCE >45°
alarms.description: Motor shaft position differs from expected by more than 45 degrees
alarms.quick_fix: Re-commission motor, check encoder mounting and coupling

alarms.name: POSITION SETPOINT/ACTUAL DIFFERENCE
alarms.description: Difference between position setpoint and actual value exceeds tolerance
alarms.quick_fix: Check mechanical system, verify encoder, tune position loop

alarms.name: POSITION ACTUAL VALUE PROCESSING ERROR
alarms.description: Error processing actual position value from encoder
alarms.quick_fix: Check encoder cable shielding, verify encoder operation

alarms.name: DRIVE ON INHIBITING STATE
alarms.description: Drive is in ON inhibiting state and cannot be enabled
alarms.quick_fix: Check interlocks and enable signals, clear pending faults

alarms.name: MOTOR STALL - TORQUE LIMIT TIMEOUT
alarms.description: Motor at torque limit below speed threshold longer than p2177
alarms.quick_fix: Check for mechanical binding, reduce load, verify sizing

alarms.name: MOTOR OVERSPEED
alarms.description: Maximum allowable motor speed exceeded
alarms.quick_fix: Check speed limits, verify encoder, check for regeneration

alarms.name: MOTOR STANDSTILL
alarms.description: Motor has stopped unexpectedly
alarms.quick_fix: Check mechanical system, verify motor has torque capability

alarms.name: DC LINK OVERVOLTAGE
alarms.description: DC link voltage exceeded maximum safe level
alarms.quick_fix: Check braking resistor, verify ramp times, check mains voltage

alarms.name: DC LINK UNDERVOLTAGE
alarms.description: DC link voltage below minimum operating level
alarms.quick_fix: Check mains supply, verify power module operation

alarms.name: POWER MODULE HEATSINK OVERTEMPERATURE
alarms.description: Power module heatsink temperature exceeded limit
alarms.quick_fix: Allow cooling, check fans and ventilation, reduce load

alarms.name: FAN FAILURE
alarms.description: Cooling fan has failed or is not operating correctly
alarms.quick_fix: Replace fan, reset operating hours counter p3961=0

alarms.name: INTERNAL HARDWARE FAULT
alarms.description: Internal software error or serious hardware fault detected
alarms.quick_fix: Hardware reset required, replace control module if persists

alarms.name: DRIVE-CLIQ COMMUNICATION ERROR
alarms.description: Communication error with DRIVE-CLiQ component
alarms.quick_fix: Check DRIVE-CLiQ cables, verify topology, power cycle component

alarms.name: EXTERNAL I/O DATA ERROR
alarms.description: Error in external I/O data communication
alarms.quick_fix: Check I/O connections, verify external device operation

alarms.name: PLC INPUT DATA ERROR
alarms.description: PLC input data contains error or is out of range
alarms.quick_fix: Reset NC system, check PLC program and sequence

alarms.name: SERIAL COMMUNICATION DATA ERROR
alarms.description: Error in serial communication data transmission
alarms.quick_fix: Verify communication parameters, check cable connections

alarms.name: DNC/RS-232 BUFFER OVERFLOW
alarms.description: Data buffer overflowed during DNC operation
alarms.quick_fix: Reduce transfer rate, add dwell commands in program

alarms.name: MAZATROL UNIT NUMBER ERROR
alarms.description: Invalid unit number in MAZATROL program
alarms.quick_fix: Check unit numbers in program, ensure sequential ordering

alarms.name: MAZATROL COMMON UNIT MISSING
alarms.description: Required common unit not found in program
alarms.quick_fix: Add common unit to program with required setup data

alarms.name: TOOL DATA NOT REGISTERED
alarms.description: Tool called in program is not registered in tool data
alarms.quick_fix: Register tool in TOOL DATA screen before running program

alarms.name: TOOL LENGTH DATA ERROR
alarms.description: Tool length offset data contains error or out of range
alarms.quick_fix: Re-measure tool and enter correct length data

alarms.name: WORKPIECE COORDINATE ERROR
alarms.description: Workpiece coordinate system data contains error
alarms.quick_fix: Re-set workpiece origin, verify coordinate values

alarms.name: MAZATROL SEQUENCE NUMBER ERROR
alarms.description: Invalid sequence number in MAZATROL program
alarms.quick_fix: Correct sequence numbering in program

alarms.name: PROCESS UNIT ERROR
alarms.description: Error in MAZATROL process unit definition
alarms.quick_fix: Review process unit settings and correct parameters

alarms.name: SHAPE UNIT ERROR
alarms.description: Error in MAZATROL shape unit definition
alarms.quick_fix: Review shape definition, ensure valid geometry

alarms.name: EIA/ISO G CODE ERROR
alarms.description: Invalid or unsupported G code in EIA/ISO program
alarms.quick_fix: Check G code validity for this control, correct syntax

alarms.name: EIA/ISO M CODE ERROR
alarms.description: Invalid or unsupported M code in EIA/ISO program
alarms.quick_fix: Verify M code is valid for this machine configuration

alarms.name: EIA/ISO CANNED CYCLE ERROR
alarms.description: Error in canned cycle definition or parameters
alarms.quick_fix: Review canned cycle parameters and format

alarms.name: EIA/ISO SUBPROGRAM ERROR
alarms.description: Error calling or executing subprogram
alarms.quick_fix: Verify subprogram exists and has proper return command

alarms.name: EIA/ISO MACRO ERROR
alarms.description: Error in macro variable or calculation
alarms.quick_fix: Check macro calculations and variable assignments

alarms.name: INTERFERENCE CHECK ALARM
alarms.description: Potential collision detected by interference check function
alarms.quick_fix: Review tool path, verify fixture setup, modify program

alarms.name: SPINDLE HEAD INTERFERENCE
alarms.description: Spindle head may collide with workpiece or fixture
alarms.quick_fix: Review Z-axis limits, adjust clearance heights

alarms.name: TURRET INTERFERENCE
alarms.description: Turret may collide during rotation or movement
alarms.quick_fix: Review turret clearance, check tool lengths

alarms.name: SERVO EMERGENCY STOP
alarms.description: Emergency stop signal detected by servo system
alarms.quick_fix: Release E-stop, check safety circuits and interlocks
alarms.source: MITSUBISHI M800/M80/E80 Series Alarm/Parameter Manual IB-1501279

alarms.name: MOTOR ENCODER NO SIGNAL
alarms.description: No signals detected in A,B,Z phase of motor encoder
alarms.quick_fix: Check encoder cable and connectors, replace encoder if needed
alarms.source: MITSUBISHI M800/M80/E80 Series Alarm/Parameter Manual IB-1501279

alarms.name: LINEAR SCALE NO SIGNAL
alarms.description: No signals detected from linear scale encoder
alarms.quick_fix: Clean scale, check cable, verify scale head operation
alarms.source: MITSUBISHI M800/M80/E80 Series Alarm/Parameter Manual IB-1501279

alarms.name: LSI OPERATION ERROR
alarms.description: LSI operation error detected in drive unit
alarms.quick_fix: Replace drive unit or servo amplifier
alarms.source: MITSUBISHI M800/M80/E80 Series Alarm/Parameter Manual IB-1501279

alarms.name: EXCESSIVE SPEED ERROR 1
alarms.description: Speed command and feedback difference exceeded 50 rpm for too long
alarms.quick_fix: Check mechanical system, reduce load, tune servo parameters
alarms.source: MITSUBISHI M800/M80/E80 Series Alarm/Parameter Manual IB-1501279

alarms.name: MOTOR GROUNDING FAULT
alarms.description: Motor power cable is in contact with frame ground
alarms.quick_fix: Inspect motor cables, check motor winding insulation
alarms.source: MITSUBISHI M800/M80/E80 Series Alarm/Parameter Manual IB-1501279

alarms.name: ABSOLUTE POSITION DATA LOST
alarms.description: Absolute position lost due to low battery voltage
alarms.quick_fix: Replace backup battery, re-establish absolute position
alarms.source: MITSUBISHI M800/M80/E80 Series Alarm/Parameter Manual IB-1501279

alarms.name: NC COMMAND ERROR
alarms.description: Travel command data from CNC was excessive
alarms.quick_fix: Check program, verify NC communication integrity
alarms.source: MITSUBISHI M800/M80/E80 Series Alarm/Parameter Manual IB-1501279

alarms.name: NC-DRV COMMUNICATION ERROR
alarms.description: Communication with CNC was interrupted
alarms.quick_fix: Check communication cables, verify NC and drive operation
alarms.source: MITSUBISHI M800/M80/E80 Series Alarm/Parameter Manual IB-1501279

alarms.name: INITIAL PARAMETER ERROR
alarms.description: Incorrect parameter detected during power on initialization
alarms.quick_fix: Re-enter servo parameters, verify all settings
alarms.source: MITSUBISHI M800/M80/E80 Series Alarm/Parameter Manual IB-1501279

alarms.name: OVERCURRENT DETECTED
alarms.description: Excessive current detected in motor drive circuit
alarms.quick_fix: Check motor and cables, reduce load, replace drive if needed
alarms.source: MITSUBISHI M800/M80/E80 Series Alarm/Parameter Manual IB-1501279

alarms.name: POWER MODULE OVERHEAT
alarms.description: Thermal protection activated in power module
alarms.quick_fix: Allow cooling, check ventilation, reduce load
alarms.source: MITSUBISHI M800/M80/E80 Series Alarm/Parameter Manual IB-1501279

alarms.name: REGENERATION CIRCUIT ERROR
alarms.description: Error in regenerative transistor or resistor
alarms.quick_fix: Check regeneration resistor and circuit
alarms.source: MITSUBISHI M800/M80/E80 Series Alarm/Parameter Manual IB-1501279

alarms.name: SPINDLE SPEED BLOCKED
alarms.description: Spindle motor failed to exceed 45 rpm at max torque
alarms.quick_fix: Check spindle mechanical system, verify brake released
alarms.source: MITSUBISHI M800/M80/E80 Series Alarm/Parameter Manual IB-1501279

alarms.name: SPINDLE SPEED OVERRUN
alarms.description: Spindle motor speed exceeded command or parameter limit
alarms.quick_fix: Check spindle control parameters, verify no runaway
alarms.source: MITSUBISHI M800/M80/E80 Series Alarm/Parameter Manual IB-1501279

alarms.name: SAFE LIMITED SPEED MONITORING ERROR
alarms.description: Speed exceeding safety limited speed detected
alarms.quick_fix: Check safe speed settings, verify safety function operation
alarms.source: MITSUBISHI M800/M80/E80 Series Alarm/Parameter Manual IB-1501279

alarms.name: PROCESSOR CHECK ERROR
alarms.description: CRC sum for control data is incorrect
alarms.quick_fix: Restart control, restore data backup if needed
alarms.source: HEIDENHAIN TNC 640 NC Error Messages Manual

alarms.name: AXIS POSITION ERROR
alarms.description: Position feedback error detected on axis
alarms.quick_fix: Check encoder, verify axis can move freely
alarms.source: HEIDENHAIN TNC 640 NC Error Messages Manual

alarms.name: AXIS OVERLOAD
alarms.description: Axis drive overload detected
alarms.quick_fix: Check for mechanical interference, reduce feed rate
alarms.source: HEIDENHAIN TNC 640 NC Error Messages Manual

alarms.name: AXIS ENCODER ERROR
alarms.description: Error in axis encoder signal
alarms.quick_fix: Check encoder cable and connections, clean or replace encoder
alarms.source: HEIDENHAIN TNC 640 NC Error Messages Manual

alarms.name: SPINDLE ORIENTATION ERROR
alarms.description: Spindle failed to complete orientation
alarms.quick_fix: Check spindle encoder and orientation sensor
alarms.source: HEIDENHAIN TNC 640 NC Error Messages Manual

alarms.name: SPINDLE SPEED ERROR
alarms.description: Spindle speed not within tolerance
alarms.quick_fix: Check spindle drive and encoder operation
alarms.source: HEIDENHAIN TNC 640 NC Error Messages Manual

alarms.name: PLC ERROR
alarms.description: Error in PLC program or communication
alarms.quick_fix: Check PLC diagnostics and I/O status
alarms.source: HEIDENHAIN TNC 640 NC Error Messages Manual

alarms.name: SAFETY RELAY ERROR
alarms.description: Error in safety relay circuit
alarms.quick_fix: Check safety relay and circuit wiring
alarms.source: HEIDENHAIN TNC 640 NC Error Messages Manual

alarms.name: TOOL MEASUREMENT ERROR
alarms.description: Error during tool measurement cycle
alarms.quick_fix: Check touch probe operation, verify tool is in spindle
alarms.source: HEIDENHAIN TNC 640 NC Error Messages Manual

alarms.name: TOOL TABLE ERROR
alarms.description: Error reading or writing tool table
alarms.quick_fix: Restore tool table from backup, check memory
alarms.source: HEIDENHAIN TNC 640 NC Error Messages Manual

alarms.name: PROGRAM SYNTAX ERROR
alarms.description: Syntax error detected in NC program
alarms.quick_fix: Check program at indicated block for syntax errors
alarms.source: HEIDENHAIN TNC 640 NC Error Messages Manual

alarms.name: PROGRAM BLOCK TOO LONG
alarms.description: NC program block exceeds maximum length
causes: Too many commands in one block
alarms.quick_fix: Split block into multiple shorter blocks
alarms.source: HEIDENHAIN TNC 640 NC Error Messages Manual

alarms.name: EXTERNAL COMMUNICATION ERROR
alarms.description: Error in external communication interface
alarms.quick_fix: Check network connection and communication settings
alarms.source: HEIDENHAIN TNC 640 NC Error Messages Manual

alarms.name: MACHINE PARAMETER ERROR
alarms.description: Invalid machine parameter detected
alarms.quick_fix: Check machine parameters, restore from backup if needed
alarms.source: HEIDENHAIN TNC 640 NC Error Messages Manual

alarms.name: SERVO AMPLIFIER ERROR
alarms.description: C-axis servo amplifier error detected
alarms.quick_fix: Check servo amplifier and motor connections

alarms.name: SERVO OVERCURRENT
alarms.description: Overcurrent detected in servo system
alarms.quick_fix: Check motor and cables, reduce cutting load

alarms.name: SPINDLE SPEED ERROR
alarms.description: Spindle speed deviation exceeded tolerance
alarms.quick_fix: Check spindle drive, reduce cutting load, check belt tension

alarms.name: SPINDLE OVERCURRENT
alarms.description: Spindle motor overcurrent detected
alarms.quick_fix: Reduce spindle load, check motor and drive

alarms.name: ATC MAGAZINE POSITION ERROR
alarms.description: Tool magazine position not detected correctly
alarms.quick_fix: Check magazine sensors, manually position magazine

alarms.name: ATC TOOL CLAMP ERROR
alarms.description: Tool clamp/unclamp operation failed
alarms.quick_fix: Check air pressure, drawbar mechanism, and sensors

alarms.name: ATC TOOL NUMBER MISMATCH
alarms.description: Tool number in spindle does not match expected
alarms.quick_fix: Verify tool numbers, update tool table

alarms.name: AIR PRESSURE LOW
alarms.description: Shop air pressure below minimum requirement
alarms.quick_fix: Check air supply, fix leaks, verify compressor operation

alarms.name: LUBRICATION SYSTEM ALARM
alarms.description: Automatic lubrication system fault
alarms.quick_fix: Check lube level, verify pump operation, inspect lines

alarms.name: OVERTRAVEL X-AXIS
alarms.description: X-axis exceeded software or hardware travel limit
alarms.quick_fix: Jog axis away from limit in opposite direction

alarms.name: OVERTRAVEL Z-AXIS
alarms.description: Z-axis exceeded software or hardware travel limit
alarms.quick_fix: Jog axis away from limit in opposite direction

alarms.name: INVERTER THERMAL ALARM
alarms.description: Inverter drive thermal protection activated
alarms.quick_fix: Allow cooling, check ventilation, reduce load

alarms.name: VACUUM SYSTEM ALARM
alarms.description: Vacuum workholding pressure insufficient
alarms.quick_fix: Check vacuum seals, verify workpiece placement

alarms.name: COOLANT PUMP ALARM
alarms.description: Coolant pump fault or low coolant level
alarms.quick_fix: Check coolant level, verify pump operation

alarms.name: ILLEGAL PLANE SELECT
alarms.description: Plane selection (G17/G18/G19) not permitted during current operation
alarms.quick_fix: Cancel current cycle before changing plane

alarms.name: ARC CENTER ERROR
alarms.description: Arc center point incorrectly specified (I,J,K values)
causes: I,J,K values don't match arc geometry
alarms.quick_fix: Verify arc center point coordinates

alarms.name: NO AXIS COMMAND IN G02/G03
alarms.description: No axis movement commanded in circular interpolation block
causes: Start and end points are same
alarms.quick_fix: Add axis movement or use full-circle format

alarms.name: INVALID AXIS MOTION
alarms.description: Axis motion not permitted in current state
alarms.quick_fix: Check axis motion restrictions for current mode

alarms.name: CIRCULAR INTERPOLATION PLANE ERROR
alarms.description: Circular motion specified for axis outside selected plane
alarms.quick_fix: Select correct plane or use helical interpolation

alarms.name: NO CENTER IN G02/G03
alarms.description: Arc center (I,J,K or R) not specified for circular interpolation
alarms.quick_fix: Add center coordinates or radius to arc command

alarms.name: POLAR COORDINATE ERROR
alarms.description: Error in polar coordinate command
alarms.quick_fix: Verify polar coordinate parameters

alarms.name: UNMATCHED DO-END
alarms.description: DO loop not properly closed with END statement
alarms.quick_fix: Add matching END statement for each DO

alarms.name: WRONG DO NUMBER
alarms.description: DO loop number invalid or duplicated
alarms.quick_fix: Use unique DO numbers (1-3)

alarms.name: REWIND NOT ALLOWED
alarms.description: Program rewind (M99) not permitted in current context
alarms.quick_fix: Check M99 placement and program structure

alarms.name: DWELL TIME ERROR
alarms.description: Invalid dwell time (P value) specified in G04
alarms.quick_fix: Specify valid positive dwell time

alarms.name: CANNED CYCLE MODAL ERROR
alarms.description: Canned cycle command conflict with modal state
causes: Conflicting G codes in same block
alarms.quick_fix: Check canned cycle modal requirements

alarms.name: RAPID TRAVERSE OVERLOAD
alarms.description: Overload during rapid traverse movement
alarms.quick_fix: Check mechanical system, clean ways, adjust servo

alarms.name: CUTTING FEED OVERLOAD
alarms.description: Overload during cutting feed movement
alarms.quick_fix: Reduce cutting load, check tool condition

alarms.name: POSITION DEVIATION EXCESSIVE
alarms.description: Following error exceeded allowable limit
alarms.quick_fix: Check for collision, verify servo parameters

alarms.name: MOTOR THERMAL OVERLOAD
alarms.description: Servo motor thermal protection activated
alarms.quick_fix: Allow motor to cool, reduce duty cycle

alarms.name: SPINDLE ORIENTATION INCOMPLETE
alarms.description: Spindle failed to complete orientation command
alarms.quick_fix: Retry orientation, check spindle encoder

alarms.name: SPINDLE SPEED NOT REACHED
alarms.description: Spindle did not reach commanded speed in time
alarms.quick_fix: Check belt tension, reduce load, check drive

alarms.name: SPINDLE SPEED FLUCTUATION
alarms.description: Spindle speed variation exceeded tolerance
alarms.quick_fix: Balance workpiece, check belt and encoder

alarms.name: TOOL MAGAZINE INDEX ERROR
alarms.description: Tool magazine failed to index to correct position
alarms.quick_fix: Check magazine sensors and motor

alarms.name: TOOL ARM SEQUENCE ERROR
alarms.description: Tool changer arm moved out of sequence
alarms.quick_fix: Check arm sensors and sequence logic

alarms.name: TOOL POT EMPTY
alarms.description: Expected tool not found in magazine pot
alarms.quick_fix: Verify tool location, update tool data

alarms.name: SERVO AMPLIFIER FAULT
alarms.description: Servo amplifier reported internal fault
alarms.quick_fix: Check servo amplifier status, power cycle

alarms.name: POSITION LOOP ERROR
alarms.description: Axis position loop error detected
alarms.quick_fix: Check encoder and mechanical system

alarms.name: CURRENT LOOP ERROR
alarms.description: Servo current loop error detected
alarms.quick_fix: Check motor, cables, and amplifier

alarms.name: SPINDLE DRIVE FAULT
alarms.description: Spindle drive reported fault condition
alarms.quick_fix: Check spindle drive diagnostics

alarms.name: SPINDLE ENCODER ERROR
alarms.description: Spindle encoder signal error
alarms.quick_fix: Check spindle encoder and cable

alarms.name: ATC TIMEOUT

alarms.quick_fix: Check ATC mechanism and air supply

alarms.name: ATC GRIPPER ERROR
alarms.description: Tool gripper failed to open or close
alarms.quick_fix: Check gripper operation and air pressure

alarms.name: COOLANT PRESSURE LOW
alarms.description: Coolant pressure below minimum requirement
alarms.quick_fix: Check coolant level, pump, and filter

alarms.name: COOLANT TEMPERATURE HIGH
alarms.description: Coolant temperature exceeded limit
alarms.quick_fix: Check chiller, reduce duty cycle

alarms.name: CONVERSATIONAL MODE ERROR

alarms.quick_fix: Check network, restart CELOS if needed

alarms.name: NC KERNEL ERROR
